description.cs: Organizujte si svůj denní rozvrh a důležité životní události v kalendáři, který je plně integrován s Thunderbirdem. Spravujte více kalendářů, organizujte si denní plán, zvěte přátele na události či odebírejte a sdílejte kalendáře.
description.en-US: Make Thunderbird or Seamonkey even more powerful with the fully integrated Lightning Calendar. Lightning allows you to organize your schedule, access remote calendars and much more. Try it today! Read the latest news and get information about known issues first by subscribing to our blog or following @mozcalendar on twitter. Lightning also supports older versions of Thunderbird, please see the complete version history for details.
description.de: Erweitern Sie Thunderbird mit Lightning zu einem vollwertigen persönlichen Informationsverwalter. So können Sie Aufgaben, Termine und Termineinladungen direkt in Thunderbird verwalten und sich mit Hilfe des Tagesplans leicht einen Überblick über alles verschaffen. Lightning wird auf dieser Seite passend zur jeweils aktuellen Version von Thunderbird bereitgestellt. Unterstützt werden aber auch ältere Versionen von Thunderbird: Zu den entsprechenden Downloads gelangen Sie über die vollständige Versionsgeschichte.
description.fr:
Transformez Thunderbird en un gestionnaire d'informations personnelles complet: Lightning vous permet d'organiser votre emploi du temps quotidien (événements et tâches) directement dans Thunderbird.
Lightning 1.0 beta2 est la dernière version stable développée pour Thunderbird 3.1. Il contient 110 corrections de bogues et améliorations par rapport à la version 1.0b1, qui améliorent la stabilité, les performances et la consommation mémoire.
description.es:
Convierte Thunderbird en un gestor de información personal completo con Lightning. Te permite administrar su agenda diaria (eventos y tareas) directamente desde dentro de Thunderbird.

Lightning 1.0 beta2 es la última versión estable generada para Thunderbird 3.1 y contiene 110 correcciones de fallos y mejoras respecto de la versión 1.0b1, que mejoran la estabilidad, rendimiento y consumo de memoria del complemento.

developer_comments.cs: Nezapomeňte si před instalací přečíst poznámky k vydání (naleznete je pod odkazem na domovskou stránku). Pokud tak neučiníte, můžete riskovat ztrátu dat.
developer_comments.fr: N'oubliez pas de lire les notes de version (disponibles sur la page du projet Lightning) avant d'installer l'extension. Ne pas le faire risque d'entraîner des pertes des données.
developer_comments.de: Bitte lesen Sie vor der Installation die Versionshinweise, die auf der Add-on-Homepage verlinkt sind. Sie enthalten wichtige Informationen zur aktuellen Version, auch zu bekannten Problemen.
developer_comments.es: Asegúrese de leer las notas de la versión (enlazadas desde la página principal indicada aquí) antes de instalar. No hacerlo puede dar lugar a la pérdida de datos.

summary.fr: Gérez votre emploi du temps quotidien directement dans Thunderbird ! L'extension Lightning vous permet de gérer un ou plusieurs agendas (local ou sur internet), les tâches, rendez-vous et invitations.
summary.de: Verwalten Sie Aufgaben und Termine direkt in Thunderbird - lokal, über Netzwerke oder über das Internet. Mit Lightning können Sie Freunde zu Terminen einladen, den Überblick über verschiedene Kalender behalten, öffentliche Kalender einbinden uvm.
summary.nl: Organiseer uw planning en belangrijke zaken in een agenda die volledig met uw Thunderbird-e-mail is geïntegreerd. Beheer meerdere agenda’s, maak uw dagelijkse to-dolijst, nodig vrienden uit voor evenementen en abonneer u op openbare agenda’s.
summary.en-US: Organize your schedule and life's important events in a calendar that's fully integrated with your Thunderbird email.  Manage multiple calendars, create your daily to do list, invite friends to events, and subscribe to public calendars.
summary.cs: Organizujte si svůj denní rozvrh a důležité životní události v kalendáři, který je plně integrován s Thunderbirdem. Spravujte více kalendářů, organizujte si denní plán, zvěte přátele na události či odebírejte a sdílejte kalendáře.
summary.es:
Gestiona tu agenda diaria desde dentro de Thunderbird. Permite gestionar calendarios locales o suscribirse a calendarios de red.
Lightning 1.0 beta2 es la última versión estable y contiene 110 correcciones y mejoras respecto de la versión 1.0b1.

description.ru:
Это расширение добавляет пункт «Сортировка папок вручную» в меню «Инструменты» Thunderbird.

По умолчанию Thunderbird сортирует папки учётной записи в алфавитном порядке. Это расширение позволяет вам выбрать собственный порядок сортировки папок, например, поместив в начале списка самые важные или переупорядочить их вручную.

Это расширение также изменяет способ автоматической сортировки папок. При этом, в отличие от стандартного способа, учитываются специальные символы Юникода. Если вы не хотите сортировать все папки вручную, добавьте юникод-символ (например, звёздочка «✸») в начале имени тех папок, которые должны находиться на вершине списка.

Это также работает для групп новостей в учётных записях блогов и лент новостей и папок любого уровня вложенности.

К тому же, вы можете аналогичным способом переупорядочить и учётные записи, теперь для этого есть специальная вкладка.
description.fr: Cette extension permet de trier manuellement les dossiers dans la liste des dossiers de Thunderbird. Voir "Manually sort folders" dans le menu "Outils". Une autre possibilité offerte par cette extension est de trier automatiquement les dossiers mais en prenant en compte (contrairement à Thunderbird par défaut) les caractères Unicode. Ceci permet, par exemple, de mettre une étoile unicode ✸ au début d'un nom de dossier de manière à le faire apparaître en haut de la liste. Avec des caractères unicode différents, on peut ainsi faire de petites catégories de dossiers sans s'encombrer d'un tri manuel ou de sous-dossiers. Il est à noter que depuis la version 0.3 cette extension permet aussi de réordonner les comptes et plus seulement les dossiers d'un compte donné.
description.en-US: This extension adds a "Manually Sort Folders" entry in the "Tools" menu of Thunderbird. By default Thunderbird sorts the folders of an account alphabetically. This extension allows you to choose a specific sort order for your folders, allowing you to put the most important ones on top, and manually order them. This extension also offers another method for automatically sorting folders. Unlike Thunderbird's default, the extension's sort method takes into account Unicode special characters. If you do not wish to sort everything manually, you can use Unicode symbols at the beginning of your folder names to put them on top. For instance, you can put a Unicode star ✸ at the beginning of your folder name to put it on top of the list without having to sort everything manually. This also works for newsgroups inside a news accounts, and also works for sub-folders, and sub-subfolders, etc. As a bonus feature, you can also re-order accounts as well, there's an extra tab for that now. The latest version now also allows you to choose the default startup folder. (Note: there have been reports that running the addon through http://addonconverter.fotokraina.com/ makes it compatible with SeaMonkey.)
description.pl: Rozszerzenie dodaje do w menu „Narzędzia” element „Sortuj foldery ręcznie”. Thunderbird domyślnie sortuje foldery alfabetycznie. Dzięki temu rozszerzeniu można ręcznie określić kolejność folderów umieszczając na górze najważniejsze. Manually Sort Folders oferuje również inną metodę automatycznego sortowania folderów niż domyślna. Rozszerzenie stosuje metodę sortowania uwzględniającą znaki specjalne Unicode. Jeśli nie chce się porządkować wszystko ręcznie, można użyć symboli Unicodee na początku nazw folderu, aby umieścić je na górze. Na przykład można umieścić na początku nazwy folderu symbol Unicode w postaci gwiazdki, by umieścić folder na szczycie listy. Ta funkcja działa również na grupach dyskusyjnych w obrębie kont, a także w folderach podrzędnych itp. Rozszerzenie umożliwia również zmianę kolejności wyświetlania kont.
description.sv-SE: Detta tillägg lägger till posten "Sortera mappar manuellt" i Thunderbirds Verktyg-meny. Som standard sorterar Thunderbird mappar under ett konto i alfabetisk ordning. Detta tillägg låter dig välja en specifik sorteringsordning för dina mappar, vilket ger dig möjligheten att placera de viktigaste mapparna överst och sortera dem manuellt. Detta tillägg erbjuder även en metod för automatisk sortering av mappar. Till skillnad från Thunderbirds standardmetod, tar tilläggets sorteringsmetod hänsyn till Unicode-specialtecken. Om du inte vill sortera allting manuellt, kan du använda Unicode-symboler i början av dina mappnamn för att placera dem överst. Du kan, exempelvis, ange en Unicode-stjärna (✸) i början av ett mappnamn för att placera mappen överst i listan utan att behöva sortera allting manuellt. Det här fungerar även för diskussionsgrupper under diskussionsgruppskonton och för undermappar, underundermappar, o.s.v. Som en bonusfunktion kan du även sortera om konton, det finns en extra flik för det nu. Den senaste versionen låter dig dessutom välja vilken standardstartmapp som skall visas vid programstart.

developer_comments.sv-SE: Detta tillägg är tämligen stabilt. Jag planerar att lägga till ytterligare funktioner, baserade på den feedback jag har fått och de förslag som jag har sett i kommentarerna, men inte inom den närmaste framtiden. Detta tillägg utvecklas på GitHub, och det finns länkar till förhandsförpackade versioner där. Du kan även rapportera om problem med tillägget där, om du vill. Detta tillägg finns utlagt för översättning på BabelZilla. Kom gärna dit och hjälp till! Om du stöter på problem och vill rapportera om det, var vänlig testa först den senaste versionen av tillägget (om du inte redan använder den) genom att klicka dig fram via "Version Information" > "See complete version history »" till sidan "Manually sort folders-versionshistorik" nederst på denna sida. Om problemet kvarstår, rapportera om det via GitHub (se ovan).
developer_comments.fr: Cette extension est encore dans ses premiers stades de développement, ce qui n'exclut pas la possibilité de bugs. Si vous en avez trouvé, n'hésitez pas à m'en faire part grâce à l'adresse email que vous pourrez trouver sur mon site personnel. Encore mieux, n'hésitez pas à m'envoyer un patch.
developer_comments.pl: Rozszerzenie jest dość stabilne. Bazując na opiniach użytkowników zamierzam w przyszłości dodać nowe funkcje. Przed wysłaniem prośby o nowe funkcje lub zgłaszaniem błędów, sprawdź najnowszą wersję rozszerzenia. Może funkcja, o którą wnioskujesz, jest już dostępna lub błąd został usunięty. Tutaj znajduje się do zrobienia, na której znajdują się zgłaszane funkcje i znane błędy, które zamierzam wprowadzić, poprawić. Manually Sort Folders jest lokalizowane przez społeczność BabelZilli. Jeśli rozszerzenie nie ma Twojej wersji językowej, przejdź na BabelZillę i spróbuj je zlokalizować!

description.en-US: Lookout is open source and always looking for developer contributions. Check out the Git Repository to contribute. Thunderbird Beta Users Please Note: Initial support is under development and available through the Git Repository for testing Original LookOut add-on by Aron Rubin for Mozilla Thunderbird is abandoned September 30, 2011: https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/lookout/ Does it mean its death? Of course not! It has been reborn! I brought it back to life! Now it is called LookOut (fix version) and works with all new Thunderbird versions. LookOut (fix version) - based on last version LookOut+ 1.2.15 by Attila K. Mergl (Last Updated: October 15, 2013) https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/lookout-1/ Please before use, remove or disable the original LookOut and LookOut+ ! ===================== What is LookOut? LookOut is a plugin which allows Thunderbird (and SeaMonkey) to interface with Microsoft's mail tools by decoding metadata and attachments encapsulated/embedded in a TNEF encoded attachment (aka winmail.dat). The TNEF decoding engine was inspired (with permission) by the TNEF project. LookOut has a full MAPI decoder and the ability to transcode some of those properties to iCalendar (ics) and vCard (vcf) formats. As an option all MAPI properties within a email can be viewed so other types of information can be deciphered.

description.ru: Enigmail вносит в ваш почтовый клиент функции OpenPGP-совместимого шифрования и электронной цифровой подписи сообщений. Это расширение позволяет автоматически зашифровывать и расшифровывать письма, а также осуществлять управление ключами. Для выполнения криптографических операций Enigmail требуется наличие GnuPG. Внимание: GnuPG не входит в пакет установки.
description.fr: Enigmail rajoute le chiffrement et la vérification OpenPGP de messages à votre programme de messageries électroniques. Enigmail se distingue par le chiffrement et le déchiffrement automatiques, et par une fonctionnalité intégrée de gestion de clés. Enigmail requiert GnuPG pour ses fonctions cryptographiques. Note: GnuPG ne fait pas partie de l'installation.
description.de: Enigmail integriert OpenPGP-Verschlüsselung und Authentifizierung in Thunderbird und Seamonkey. Dabei stellt Enigmail die Benutzeroberfläche zur Verfügung, während die Verschlüsselung selbst von GnuPG im Hintergrund vorgenommen wird. Enigmail bietet automatische Ver- und Entschlüsselung an, sowie eine grafische Oberfläche zur Verwaltung von Schlüsseln. Anmerkung: GnuPG ist nicht Teil von Enigmail, wird aber bei Bedarf automatisch installiert.
description.en-US: Enigmail adds OpenPGP message encryption and authentication to your email client. It features automatic encryption, decryption and integrated key management functionality. Enigmail is based on GnuPG for the cryptographic functions. Note: GnuPG is not part of the installation, but will be downloaded as part of the setup process.
description.ja: Enigmail で、あなたのメールクライアントに OpenPGP のメッセージ暗号化および認証機能を追加できます。自動化された暗号化および復号機能、統合化された鍵管理機能が特徴です。Enigmail を利用するには、暗号機能を提供する GnuPG が必要です。 注意: Enigmail のパッケージに GnuPG は含まれていませんが、セットアップのプロセス中にダウンロードされます。
description.es: Enigmail añade a tu cliente de correo, cifrado y autenticación de mensajes mediante OpenPGP. Ofrece cifrado y descifrado automático y una funcionalidad integrada de administración de claves. Enigmail requiere GnuPG para las funciones criptográficas. Nota: GnuPG no es parte de la instalación.

developer_comments.en-US: The source code is available at http://www.enigmail.net/download/source.php

description.en-US: Using Thunderbird, Quicktext is the perfect tool to help you quickly answer routine, repetitive emails. Quicktext performs both simple and complex tasks. The extension can insert different signatures into your emails depending on whom you are sending the email to. Even better, you can use variables like [[TO=firstname]] to personalize your emails. You can also specify the subject and which attachments to add when creating a template for your email. If you are a new user to Quicktext, start with reading the pages in the getting started section of the quicktext wiki. They will help you with installing and setting up Quicktext.

description.en-US: Use version 2.1.13 for TB 60 and earlier. 3.1.x is only for Thunderbird 67 beta and later. Thunderbird 68 should work with version 3.1.6 and later. See my blog for details and instructions for TB 60 and 68. Synchronizes contacts between Thunderbird and one or more Google accounts. It can synchronize the My Contacts group, all contacts, or all contacts and groups (with mailing lists). Please read the FAQs before posting a review: http://www.pirules.org/addons/gcontactsync/faq.php. You must enable cookies and allow JavaScript from google.com in Thunderbird, not your web browser. Questions and requests for help should be posted in the forum instead of a review. *Important* NOTE: Mailing lists are buggy, but gContactSync tries to work around these bugs whenever possible. By default 3.0.0 and later skip contacts without email addresses. If you change this the fake e-mail addresses nobody...@nowhere.invalid are necessary to prevent bugs in mailing lists and are only stored in Thunderbird (they'll never make it to Google). It is best to drag contacts into the main address book and add them to groups from Google's interface. Please read the Developer Comments as well.
description.de:
gContactSync synchronizes contacts between Thunderbird or Seamonkey and one or more Google accounts. It can synchronize on the My Contacts group, all contacts, or all contacts and groups (with mailing lists). Many mobile devices and some other sync apps only synchronize with the My Contacts group, so most people can choose that option after logging in for the first time. *Important* NOTE: Mailing lists are buggy, but gContactSync tries to work around these bugs whenever possible. The fake e-mail addresses nobody...@nowhere.invalid are necessary to prevent bugs in mailing lists. It is best to drag contacts into the main address book and add them to groups from Google's interface. Don't try to delete or rename "My Contacts", "Coworkers", "Family", or "Friends" or you may have to 'reset' that address book. Tutorial/Demo (work in progress): http://www.pirules.org/extensions/gcontactsync/tutorial/intro.php It makes several modifications and improvements to the Address Book including more fields and types for several fields. Supported applications:
  • Thunderbird 2 and up (including 3.0 and 3.1)
  • Seamonkey 2 and up
  • Icedove (Debian-branded Thunderbird)
  • Support for Postbox coming soon
Please read the Developer Comments as well.

developer_comments.de:
I have several new features planned for 0.3.0 and welcome more suggestions.  0.3 will allow synchronizing one account with several address books and supports synchronizing an address book with only one group of your choice.

If you find a bug or have a question, please let me know about it.  See the support information for the details.

Note: Mailing Lists in Thunderbird in Seamonkey are still somewhat buggy, especially when contacts are dragged and dropped into them.  They don't work with contacts that don't have e-mail addresses, so gContactSync will add e-mail addresses like nobody@nowhere.invalid.

If the synchronization fails or the status text says "Synchronizing..." after dragging contacts into a mailing list, go to gContactSync -> Preferences -> Accounts then click "Reset All Synced ABs" and restart Thunderbird.  If you want to change the groups a contact is in, you may want to use Google's interface.

summary.de: Synchronizes Address Books in Thunderbird or Seamonkey with Google Contacts and can synchronize groups with mailing lists.
summary.pt-PT: gContactSync é um extra que sincroniza os seus Contactos do Google com o Livro de Endereços do Thunderbird 2 ou 3.
summary.en-US: Synchronizes contacts & groups between Thunderbird and Google Contacts.
summary.ko: gContactSync는 Google 주소록과 Thunderbird 주소록을 동기화하는 부가 기능입니다.
summary.it: gContactSync è un componente aggiuntivo che sincronizza i tuoi contatti Google con una Rubrica di Thunderbird 2 o 3.
summary.pt-BR: gContactSync é um complemento que sincroniza os seus Contatos do Google com um Catálogo de Endereço no Thunderbird 2 ou 3.
summary.sv-SE: gContactSync synkroniserar dina Google-kontakter med Thunderbird
summary.es: gContactSync sincroniza tus contactos de Google con la libreta de direcciones de Thunderbird.

description.fr: Ce module ajoute un symbole dans le panneau d'en-tête du message pour basculer entre une vue compacte et détaillée. La vue compacte peut être configuré sur une ou deux lignes. Une boîte de dialogue de personnalisation est accessible par un clic-droit dans le panneau d'en-tête des messages. Attention, ce module est incompatible avec CustomizeHeaderToolbar https://addons.mozilla.org/thunderbird/addon/45601 Le raccourci clavier "MAJ + h" permet de basculer entre la vue compacte et détaillée. Ce module intègre également la fonctionnalité de «RSS Linkify Sujet" par Alex Dedul (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/1704). Il y a aussi une option pour n'afficher que les adresses e-mail dans la vue compacte. Si vous souhaitez utiliser la dernière version, vous la trouverez sur le canal du développement du module, en bas de cette page. Si vous rencontrez un bug merci de le rapporter sur le fil dédié de Mozillazine (en Anglais): http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=1405155
description.en-US: For Thunderbird 68.0 or newer you can use the beta version available at https://github.com/jmozmoz/compactheader/releases For versions older then Thunderbird 37 use version 2.0.9 (see the version histroy) Thunderbird does not anymore have the ability to reduce the display size of header pane to one line (as in Thunderbird 2.0). This add-on adds a symbol to compact and expand the message header plane. The compact header view mode can be set to either one or two lines. A customization dialog can be opened for the toolbar in the header pane (right mouse button context menu) to change the displayed buttons and their style. The shortcut "SHIFT+h" can be used to toggle between expanded and compact header view. This add-on integrates the functionality of "RSS Linkify Subject" by Alex Dedul (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/1704). There is also an option to display only the email addresses in the compact header view. Another option enables darkening the message header, if the message pane has focus. If you want to use the latest version, look for it at http://compactheader.mozdev.org/installation.html There you will find the latest beta versions. There are several bug reports about a disappearing header pane in the compact header view mode. I could reproduce it if the TB Header Tools Extension is installed at the same time, see http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?p=8543415#p8543415 If you encounter any bug please post information at the support thread at mozillazine: http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=1405155

summary.fr: Ajout d'une icône dans le panneau d'en-tête des messages pour basculer entre une vue compacte et détaillée. Options pour afficher une ou deux lignes d'en-tête, personnalisation des boutons affichés, transforme en lien cliquable l'objet des fils RSS.
summary.en-US: Add symbol in header plane to switch between compact and expanded view. New beta versions for the current beta of Thunderbird 68.0 can be found at https://github.com/jmozmoz/compactheader/
summary.hu: A fejléc méretének egy vagy két sorral való módosítása. Link témák az RSS csatornákban.

description.el: Αλλάζει το "Send Later" εντολής (Ctrl + Shift + Return) στο παράθυρο σύνθεση μηνύματος, έτσι ώστε αντί απλώς αντιγράφοντας το μήνυμα στο φάκελο "Εξερχόμενα", έτσι ώστε να αποσταλεί την επόμενη φορά που πηγαίνετε σε απευθείας σύνδεση ή να κάνετε «Αποστολή μη απεσταλμένα μηνύματα», ένα παράθυρο διαλόγου σκάει επάνω που σας επιτρέπει να καθορίσετε πότε θα σταλεί το μήνυμα. Μπορείτε να καθορίσετε μια συγκεκριμένη ώρα και ημερομηνία, ή κάντε κλικ στο κουμπί "15 mins later", "30 mins later" ή "2 hours later", ή κάντε κλικ στο κουμπί "Put in Outbox" για να πάρει το ενσωματωμένο Thunderbird"Send Later" λειτουργία (δηλ., αντίγραφο στα εξερχόμενα). Για πρόσθετες πληροφορίες, ανατρέξτε στον λίστας αλληλογραφίας! Αποστολή αργότερα χρησιμοποιεί SugarJS by Andrew Plummer. Ευχαριστώ Andrew!
description.ca: Modifica la comanda "Enviar més tard" (Ctrl+Majúsc+Intro) a la finestra de redacció, de manera que en comptes de copiar el missatge a la safata de sortida perquè s'enviï la propera vegada que es connecti o es doni l'ordre d'"Enviar els missatges pendents", es mostra una finestra emergent que permet especificar quan s'enviarà el missatge. Es pot especificar una data i hora, o seleccionar "15 minuts després", "30 minuts després" o "2 hores després", o marcar "Enviar a la safata de sortida" per obtenir la funcionalitat pròpia per "Enviar més tard" de Thunderbird, és a dir, copiar a la safata de sortida. Per informació addicional, pot consultar la guia d'usuari. Uneix-te a la llista de correus! Send Later utilitza SugarJS d'Andrew Plummer. Gràcies Andrew!
description.it: Modifica il comando "Invia Dopo" (Ctrl+Shift+Invio) nella finistra di composizione del messaggio, cosi che invece che semplicemente copiare il messaggio nella tua Posta in Uscita perchè venga inviato la prossima volta che sei online o esegui "Invia Messaggi in Uscita", compare una finestra di dialogo che ti permette di specificare quando il messaggio debba essere inviato. Puoi indicare una specifica data e ora, o cliccare "Tra 15 minuti", "Tra 30 minuti" or "Tra 2 ore", o cliccare "Metti nella Posta in Uscita" per replicare la funzionalità nativa di Thunderbird "Invia Dopo" (ovvero, copiare nella Posta in Uscita). Per ulteriori informazioni, leggi il manuale utente. Iscriviti alla mailing list! Send Later usa SugarJS di Andrew Plummer. Grazie Andrew!
description.fi: Muuttaa "Lähetä myöhemmin" komentoa (Ctrl+Shift+Return) viestin luonti-ikkunassa, jotta pelkän Lähtevät-kansioon kopioimisen sijasta se lähetetään kun luot yhteyden verkkoon tai painat "Lähetä lähettämättömät viestit", jolloin ilmestyy dialogi joka antaa sinun määritää milloin viesti lähetetään. Voit määrittää tietyn ajan ja päivämäärän tai painaa "15 min myöhemmin", "30 min myöhemmin" tai "2 tuntia myöhemmin" tai käyttää normaalia Thunderbirdin "Lähetä myöhemmin" toimintoa (jolloin viesti siis vain kopioidaan Lähtevät-kansioon). Lisätietoja saat käyttöohjeesta. Liity sähköpostilistalle! Send Later käyttää Andrew Plummerin SugarJS:ää. Kiitos Andrew!
description.cs: Upravuje příkaz „Odeslat později“ (Ctrl + Shift + Return) v okně pro vytvoření zprávy, takže místo pouhého zkopírování zprávy do složky „Pošta k odeslání“, aby byla odeslána později při dalším připojení, nebo při použití funkce „Odeslat neodeslané zprávy“, se otevře dialogové okno, ve kterém můžete určit, kdy má být zpráva odeslána. Pro pozdější odeslání zprávy můžete určit konkrétní čas a datum, nebo použít předvolby „Za 15 minut“, „Za 30 minut“ a „Za 2 hodiny“, nebo kliknout na „Dát do „Pošty k odeslání““ pro použití originální funkce „Odeslat později“ v Thunderbirdu (tj., zkopírovat zprávu do složky „Pošty k odeslání“). Další informace naleznete v uživatelské příručce. Připojte se k mailing listu! „Odeslat později“ využívá SugarJS od Andrew Plummera. Díky Andrew!
description.sv-SE: Ändrar kommandot "Skicka senare" (Ctrl+Skift+Retur) i Skriv-fönstret. Istället för att endast kopiera meddelandet till din utkorg, så att det skickas nästa gång du ansluter till Internet eller klickar på "Skicka meddelanden som inte är skickade", visas ett dialogfönster som låter dig bestämma när meddelandet skall skickas. Du kan ange en viss tid och ett visst datum, klicka på de förinställda värdena "15 min senare", "30 min senare" eller "2 timmar senare", eller klicka på "Lägg i utkorgen" för att använda Thunderbirds inbyggda "Skicka senare"-funktion (d.v.s. kopiera till utkorgen). Läs användarhandboken för ytterligare information. Gå med i e-postlistan! Skicka senare använder SugarJS av Andrew Plummer. Tusen tack, Andrew!
description.es: Cambia el comando "enviar después" (Ctrl+May+Enter) en la ventana de composición de mensajes, para que en vez de simplemente copiar el mensaje a la bandeja de salida para enviarse la siguiente vez que Vd. se conecte (o ejecute "procesar mensajes" no enviados), un diálogo aparezca para permitirle especificar cuándo se enviará el mensaje. Puede especificar una fecha y hora específicas o hacer click en "15 minutos más tarde", "30 minutos más tarde" o "2 horas más tarde", o, alternativamente, pulsar "enviar a bandeja de salida" para tener la funcionalidad nativa de Thunderbird para envío diferido. Para información adicional, mire la guía de usuario en: Send Later user guide. Apúntese a la ilsta de correo en: mailing list! EnviarDespués (SendeLater) utiliza SugarJS por Andrew Plummer. ¡Gracias Andrew!
description.ru: Вызывайте команду "Send Later" (Ctrl+Shift+Return) из окна редактирования письма, чтобы взамен простого копирования сообщения в вашу папку «Исходящие» оно было бы отправлено в следующий раз, когда вы будете онлайн или отправите «Неотправленные сообщения». Эту команду возможно изменить в диалоговом окне, позволяющем указать время отправки сообщения. Чтобы воспользоваться встроенной функцией "Send Later" в Thunderbird (например, скопировать в папку «Исходящие»), Вы можете установить определенное время и дату или нажать на клавиши "15 минут спустя", или "30 минут спустя", или "2 часа спустя", или "Поместить в папку «Исходящие»". Для дополнительной информации смотрите Руководство Пользователя. Подпишитесь на рассылку! Send Later использует SugarJS Андрея Пламмера. Спасибо, Андрей!
description.nl: Verandert het "Send Later" commando (Ctrl+Shift+Return) in het bericht aanmaken scherm, zodat in plaats van alleen maar kopiëren van het bericht in je Uitgaande mail map zodat het wordt verzonden de volgende keer dat je online gaat of "Verzend nog niet verzonden berichten" doet, een dialoogvenster opkomt dat het mogelijk maakt om aan te geven wanneer het bericht zal worden verzonden. Je kan een specifieke tijd en datum aangeven, of klik "15 min. later", "30 min. later" of 2 uur later", of klik "Zet in Uitgaande mail" om de ingebouwde Thunderbird "Send Later" functionaliteit te krijgen (m.a.w. kopieer naar Uitgaande mail). Voor meer informatie, zie de gebruikershandleiding. Doe mee met de maillijst! Send Later gebruikt SugarJS van Andrew Plummer. Bedankt Andrew!
description.en-US: Changes the "Send Later" command (Ctrl+Shift+Return) in the message composition window, so that instead of merely copying the message into your Outbox so that it is sent the next time you go online or do "Send Unsent Messages", a dialog pops up which allows you to specify when the message will be sent. You can specify a specific time and date, or click "15 mins later", "30 mins later" or "2 hours later", or click "Put in Outbox" to get the built-in Thunderbird "Send Later" functionality (i.e., copy to Outbox). For additional information, see the user guide. Join the mailing list! Send Later uses SugarJS by Andrew Plummer. Thanks Andrew!
description.ro: Schimbă comanda „Trimite mai târziu” (Ctrl+Shift+Return) din fereastra de compunere a mesajului: în loc ca mesajul să fie doar pus în dosarul „De trimis” pentru a fi trimis la următoarea operațiune de trimitere, fie când aplicația revine online fie la „Trimite mesajele neexpediate”, se va deschide o fereastra care permite programarea trimiterii mesajului. Se poate selecta fie o anumita dată/oră, fie „peste 15 minute”, „peste 30 minute” sau „peste 2 ore”, fie „Pune în „De trimis”” pentru a obține funcționalitatea implicită din Thunderbird pentru „Trimite mai târziu” (adică copiere în „De trimis”). Pentru informații suplimentare, vezi: ghidul utilizatorului. Înscrie-te în lista de corespondență! Send Later folosește SugarJS de Andrew Plummer. Mulțumesc Andrew!
description.pl: Zmienia wbudowane polecenie "Wyślij później" (Ctrl + Shift + Return) w oknie tworzenia wiadomości, tak, że zamiast zwykłego umieszczenia wiadomości w skrzynce nadawczej aby były wysyłane przy następnym przejściu w tryb online lub użycia polecenia "Wyślij niewysłane wiadomości", wyskakuje okno dialogowe które pozwala określić, kiedy wiadomość zostanie wysłana. Możesz podać datę i godzinę wysłania, lub wybrać opóźnienie "za 15 min.", "za 30 min.", "za 2 godz." albo użyć "umieść w skrzynce nadawczej" i pozwolić działać wbudowanej w Thunderibirda funkcjonalności "Wyślij później". Po dodatkowe informacje zajżyj do instrukcji. Dołącz się i zapisz się do listy mailingowej! Send Later używa SugarJS autorstwa Andrew Plummer. Dzięki Andrew!
description.fr: Modifie la commande « Envoyer plus tard » (Ctrl + Maj + Retour) dans la fenêtre de composition de message, de sorte qu’au lieu de simplement envoyer le message, une boîte de dialogue apparaît qui vous permet d’indiquer quand le message sera envoyé. Vous pouvez spécifier une date et heure précise ou cliquer sur « 15 minutes plus tard », « 30 minutes plus tard » ou « 2 heures plus tard » ou cliquer sur « Envoyer plus tard » pour utiliser la fonction native de Thunderbird (copie le message dans la boîte d'envoi). Pour plus d’informations, consultez le guide de l’utilisateur. Inscrivez-vous sur la liste de diffusion ! Envoyer plus tard utilise SugarJS par Andrew Plummer. Merci Andrew!
description.bg: Променя командата "Изпращане по-късно" (Ctrl + Shift + Return) в прозореца за съставяне на съобщения, така че вместо просто да копира съобщението във вашата Изходяща кутия, за да бъде изпратено следващия път, когато отворите приложението или изпращате "Изпращане на неизпратените писма", отваря диалогов прозорец, който ви позволява да посочите, кога да бъде изпратено съобщението. Може да зададете определено време и дата, или да щракнете върху "15 минути по-късно", "30 минути по-късно" или "2 часа по-късно", или да щракнете върху "Поставяне в изходящи", за да получите вградената в Thunderbird "Изпращане по-късно" функционалност (т.е., копиране в папка "Изходяща кутия"). За допълнителна информация вижте ръководство на потребителя. Присъединете се към пощенския списък! Изпращане по-късно използва SugarJS от Андрю Плъмър. Благодаря Андрю!
description.de: Verändert den „Später senden”-Befehl (Strg+Umschalt+Enter) im Entwurfs-Fenster so, dass die Nachricht nicht nur in den Postausgang kopiert und bei der nächsten Sitzung versendet wird oder mit „Nachrichten aus Postausgang senden” verschickt werden kann, sondern ein Dialog erscheint, in dem Sie genauer angeben können, wann die Nachricht versendet werden soll. Sie können spezifische Zeit- und Datumsangaben machen oder entweder „in 15 Minuten”, „in 30 Minuten”, „in zwei Stunden” bzw. „In den Postausgang verschieben” auswählen, um die „Später senden”-Funktion von Thunderbird zu verwenden (d.h. die Nachricht in den Postausgang zu verschieben.) Für weitere Informationen lesen Sie das Handbuch. Treten Sie der Mailing-Liste bei! Später senden benutzt SugarJS von Andrew Plummer. Danke Andrew!
description.hu: Az üzenet-összetétel ablakban megváltoztatja a „Küldés később” parancsot (Ctrl+Shift+Enter), hogy ahelyett, hogy csak az üzeneteket másolná a Kimenő mappába, hogy elküldje a következő alkalommal, amikor online megy, vagy „Postázandó üzenetek elküldése”, megjelenik egy párbeszédablak, amely lehetővé teszi, hogy megadja, mikor küld az üzenet. Megadhat egy adott időpontot és dátumot, vagy kattintson a „15 perccel később”, „30 perccel később” vagy „2 órával később” gombra, vagy kattintson a „Kimenő üzenetek” gombra a beépített Thunderbird „Küldés később” funkciójának eléréséhez (azaz, másolja a Postázandó üzenetek mappába). További tájékoztatókért kattintson ide a felhasználói útmutató megtekintéséhez. Csatlakozzon a levelezési listához! A Küldés később használja a Plummer András által SugarJS készített alkalmazást. Köszönöm, András!
description.pt-BR: Altera o "Enviar mais tarde" (Ctrl + Shift + Return) na janela de composição da mensagem, de modo que em vez de simplesmente copiar a mensagem em sua caixa de saída para que ele seja enviada na próxima vez que estiver online ou "Enviar mensagens não enviadas", aparece uma janela que lhe permite especificar quando a mensagem será enviada. Você pode especificar uma data e hora, ou clique em "15 minutos mais tarde", "30 minutos mais tarde" ou "2 horas mais tarde", ou clique em "Coloque na Caixa de saída" para obter o built-in Thunderbird "Enviar mais tarde" funcionalidade (ou seja, , copiar a caixa de saída). Para obter informações adicionais, consulte o guia do usuário. Junte-se à lista de discussão! Enviar mais tarde usa SugarJS por Andrew Plummer. Obrigado Andrew!
description.nb-NO: Endrer "Send senere" -kommandoen (Ctrl + Shift + Enter) i meldingsammensetningsvinduet, slik at i stedet for bare å kopiere meldingen til utgangen din slik at den sendes neste gang du går online eller gjør "Send ikke sendte meldinger" en dialogboks dukker opp som lar deg spesifisere når meldingen skal sendes. Du kan spesifisere en bestemt dato og klokkeslett, eller klikk "15 minutter senere", "30 minutter senere" eller "2 timer senere", eller klikk "Sett inn i utgang" for å få den innebygde Thunderbird "Send later" -funksjonaliteten (dvs., kopier til utgang). For mer informasjon, se brukerhåndboken . Bli med på postlisten ! Send senere bruker SugarJS av Andrew Plummer. Takk Andrew!
description.ja: メッセージ作成ウィンドウの"後で送信"コマンド(Ctrl+Shift+Return)を変更しました。 単にメッセージを送信箱にコピーして次回オンラインになった時や"未送信メッセージを送信する"を実行したときにそのメッセージが送信されるようにする代わりに、ダイアログが表示され、メッセージをいつ送信するかを指定できるようになります。 特定の日時を指定することもできますが、"15分後", "30分後"あるいは"2時間後", or click "Put in Outbox" to get the built-in Thunderbird "Send Later" functionality (i.e., copy to Outbox). さらに詳しい情報はユーザーガイドをご覧ください。 Send Lateユーザーのメーリングリストに参加してください! Send LaterはAndrew Plummer氏によるSugarJSを使用しています。ありがとうAndrew!
description.he: משנה את הפקודה "שלח מאוחר יותר" (Ctrl + Shift + Return) בחלון כתיבת הודעה, כך שבמקום להעתיק את ההודעה לתיבת הדואר היוצא היא תישלח בפעם הבאה שתתחבר לאינטרנט או שתבחר באפשרות "שלח הודעות שלא נשלחו", ותוצג תיבת דו שיח בה ניתן לציין מתי יש לשלוח את ההודעה. תוכל להגדיר תאריך ושעה ספציפיים, או ללחוץ "בעוד 15 דקות", "בעוד 30 דקות" או "בעוד שעתיים", או ללחוץ "העבר לתיבת דואר יוצא" כדי להשתמש בתכונה "שלח מאוחר יותר" המובנית של Thunderbird (כלומר, העתקה לתיבת דואר יוצא). לפרטים נוספים, עיין במדריך למשתמש. הצטרף לרשימת התפוצה! Send Later משתמש ב- SugarJS מאת אנדרו פלאמר. תודה, אנדרו!
description.pt-PT: Mudanças no comando (Ctrl+Shift+Return) "Send Latter"na janela de composição da mensagem. Invés de meramente copiar a mensagem para a caixa de entrada da próxima vez que entrar online ou fazer "sent Unsent Messages" uma caixa de dialogo aparece e que lhe irá permitir qual a mensagem que será enviada. Pode especificar uma hora e uma data, ou escolher "15min mais tarde", "30min lmais tarde" or "2h mais tarde", ou clique em "Put in Outbox" para obter a funcionalidade do Thunderbird "Send later" (ex: copiar para a Outbox). Para mais informação veja user guide. Junte-se em mailing list! "Send Later" usa SugarJS by Andrew Plummer. Thanks Andrew!

description.de: (Locale troubles? Try the beta version. Found a bug? Report it or write me. There's also a Seamonkey version.) Eine völlige GPL-LGPL-MPL-Neuentwicklung des nunmehr veralteten 'Remove Duplicate Messages'. Fähigkeiten und Geschwindigkeit übertreffen den Vorgänger um ein Vielfaches, unter anderem: - Auswahl der Vergleichskriterien (Betreff, Verfasser, Datum usw.) - Vergleich der Nachrichtentexte - Ausführung in mehreren Verzeichnissen - Vorschaudialog zur zusätzlichen Kontrolle der Änderungen - Gute Geschwindigkeit in lokalen Ordnern mit einer hohen Zahl an Nachrichten; annehmbare Geschwindigkeit in IMAP- und RSS-Konten.
description.nl: (Een bug gevonden? Meld deze of schrijf me. Er is ook een SeaMonkey-versie) Het oorspronkelijke ‘Remove Duplicate Messages’ mist belangrijke functies en heeft geen licentie voor vrije software. Dit is een volledige herschrijving met een GPL-LGPL-MPL-licentie. De prestaties zijn verbeterd en er zijn vele functies en mogelijkheden toegevoegd, waaronder: - Keuze van vergelijkingscriteria (onderwerp, schrijver, datum, etc.) - Vergelijking van berichtteksten - Actie binnen meerdere mappen - Dialoogvenster om te controleren wat u wilt weggooien en wat u wilt behouden - Goede prestaties bij lokale mappen met grote aantallen berichten; redelijke prestaties bij IMAP- en RSS-accounts - Elegant(e) werkbalkknop en -menu.
description.en-US: (As Thunderbird is undergoing massive changes under the hood, always look for a beta of this extension for support of the latest Thunderbird version. You are also welcome to report bugs or write me.) This is a full rewrite of the original, proprietary, of the 'Remove Duplicate Messages' extension, with an GPL-LGPL-MPL license. The rewrite has included significant performance improvement, and several important features and capabilities, have been added, including: - Choice of comparison criteria (subject, author, date, etc). - Comparison of message bodies. - Action on multiple folders. - Review dialog for double-checking which duplicates to delete and which to keep. - Good performance on local folders with large number of messages; reasonable performance with IMAP and RSS accounts. - Spiffy toolbar button+menu. There's also a SeaMonkey version, though not as frequently tested.
description.it: (Locale troubles? Try the beta version. Found a bug? Report it or write me. There's also a Seamonkey version.) Questa estensione (rilasciata su licenza GPL-LGPL-MPL) si basa sulla precedente 'Remove Duplicate Messages', attualmente non più sviluppata, superando quest'ultima in funzionalità e prestazioni: - possibilità di scelta dei criteri di confronto (oggetto, autore, data, ecc. ecc.) - confronto basato sul corpo del messaggio - ricerca su cartelle multiple - finestra di riepilogo finale per poter scegliere che cosa cancellare definitivamente - buone prestazioni per cartelle locali con un gran numero di messaggi; prestazioni accettabili per account IMAP e RSS
description.da: (Locale troubles? Try the beta version. Found a bug? Report it or write me. There's also a Seamonkey version.) En GPL-LGPL-MPL fuld omskrivning af den nu-zombie-iske 'Remove Duplicate Messages'. Muligheder og ydelse overgår dem fra den oprindelige udvidelse, inklusive: - Valg af sammenligningskriterier (emne, afsender, dato, osv.) - Sammenligning af meddelelsestekst - Handling på flere mapper - Gennemgå-dialog for doublecheck af hvad der skal slettes og hvad der skal beholdes - God ydelse på lokale mapper med et stort antal meddelelser; fornuftig ydelse med IMAP og RSS konti. - Smart værktøjslinjeknap+menu.
description.sk: (Locale troubles? Try the beta version. Found a bug? Report it or write me. There's also a Seamonkey version.) V súlade s licenciou GPL-LGPL-MPL úplne prepracované rozšírenie, vychádzajúce z pôvodného rozšírenia "Remove Duplicate Messages". Výkonom a schopnosťami prekonáva možnosti pôvodného rozšírenia, zahŕňa: - výber kritéria pre porovnávanie (predmet, autor, dátum atď.) - porovnávanie obsahu správ (telo správy) - prehľadávanie v rámci viacerých priečinkov - kontrolné okno, v ktorom môžete dvojitým kliknutím vybrať, ktoré správy chcete odstrániť a ktoré ponechať - dobrý výkon aj pri lokálnych priečinkoch s veľkým množstvom správ; primeraný výkon pri účtoch typu IMAP a RSS
description.he: (מצאת באג או בעיה? דווח/י עליו או . ויש גם גרסת SeaMonkey של ההרחבה) שכתוב מלא, ברישיון GPL-LGPL-MPL, של ההרחבה 'Remove Duplicate Messages' - אשר הינה כרגע מעין זומבי ללא השגחה. דיווחי באגים, בקשות הרחבת יכולת וכו' יתקבלו בברכה, כפי שיתקבלו גם מפתחים/ות המבקשים/ות לעבוד על ההרחבה עם המפתח הבודד כרגע...

developer_comments.en-US: I had tried contacting the author of the original 'Remove Duplicate Messages' several times, without success. I would have liked to join forces and have just one extension, but that doesn't seem to work out. Also, some locales are incomplete - help with them would be appreciated. Visit the BabelZilla translation website.

description.en-US:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Version 5.6.0 for Thunderbird 60: (RECOMMENDED) Mail Merge is fully compatible with Thunderbird 60. Please make sure to use version 5.6.0. Version 6.0.0 for Thunderbird 68: Mail Merge is fully compatible with Thunderbird 68. Please make sure to use version 6.0.0. Otherwise: Check for Updates in the Add-ons Manager ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Description: If you want to send a message to multiple recipients, there are a few common problems: 1) When you add the recipients in the To field, the recipients will see each other. (You can work around this problem by adding the recipients in the Bcc field.) 2) Most email providers limit the number of recipients in the To / Cc / Bcc field. (You can work around this problem by creating multiple messages.) 3) You cannot personalize the message. (You cannot work around this problem.) You can work around some of these problems, but especially the last problem cannot be solved without creating individual messages. Of course there are third party services, that help you to send newsletters; but you have to trust them. Mail Merge solves these problems by creating individual messages for each recipient from a draft message - locally on your computer without the need to trust third party services! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Step by Step: (Address Book) Screenshots: Draft Message | Draft Message | Draft Message | Mail Merge Dialog | Preview Message Dialog
  1. Create a New Message ("File -> New -> Message")
  2. Add the Recipients to To or add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: {{PrimaryEmail}} or {{FirstName}} {{LastName}} <{{PrimaryEmail}}>
  3. Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)
  4. Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)
  5. Add the Subject (variables are supported)
  6. Add the Body (variables are supported)
  7. Add (global) Attachments (optional)
  8. Click "File -> Mail Merge"
  9. Select "Address Book" and check "Deliver Mode"
  10. Add (individual) Attachments (optional) (variables are supported)
  11. Check "Start", "Stop" and "Pause" (optional)
  12. Click "OK"
The Draft Message is saved as Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox ("Local Folders -> Outbox"). Ready for Delivery: "File -> Send Unsent Messages" Step by Step: (CardBook) Screenshots: Draft Message | Draft Message | Draft Message | Mail Merge Dialog | Preview Message Dialog
  1. Create a New Message ("File -> New -> Message")
  2. Add the Recipients to To or add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: {{email}} or {{firstname}} {{lastname}} <{{email}}>
  3. Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)
  4. Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)
  5. Add the Subject (variables are supported)
  6. Add the Body (variables are supported)
  7. Add (global) Attachments (optional)
  8. Click "File -> Mail Merge"
  9. Select "CardBook" and check "Deliver Mode"
  10. Add (individual) Attachments (optional) (variables are supported)
  11. Check "Start", "Stop" and "Pause" (optional)
  12. Click "OK"
The Draft Message is saved as Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox ("Local Folders -> Outbox"). Ready for Delivery: "File -> Send Unsent Messages" Step by Step: (CSV) Screenshots: Draft Message | Draft Message | Mail Merge Dialog | Preview File Dialog | Preview Message Dialog
  1. Create a New Message ("File -> New -> Message")
  2. Add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: {{Email}} or {{FirstName}} {{LastName}} <{{Email}}>
  3. Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)
  4. Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)

The Draft Message is saved as Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox ("Local Folders -> Outbox"). Ready for Delivery: "File -> Send Unsent Messages" Step by Step: (JSON) Screenshots: Draft Message | Draft Message | Mail Merge Dialog | Preview File Dialog | Preview Message Dialog

  2. Add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: {{Email}} or {{FirstName}} {{LastName}} <{{Email}}>
  3. Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)

Ready for Delivery: "File -> Send Unsent Messages" Step by Step: (Spreadsheet) Screenshots: Draft Message | Draft Message | Mail Merge Dialog | Preview File Dialog | Preview Message Dialog
  1. Create a New Message ("File -> New -> Message")
  2. Add the Variable(s) to To, e.g.: {{Email}} or {{FirstName}} {{LastName}} <{{Email}}>
  3. Add other Recipients to Cc (optional) (variables are supported)
  4. Add other Recipients to Bcc (optional) (variables are supported)
  5. Add the Subject (variables are supported)
  6. Add the Body (variables are supported)
  7. Add (global) Attachments (optional)
  8. Click "File -> Mail Merge"
  9. Select "Spreadsheet" as "Source" and check "Deliver Mode"
  10. Add (individual) Attachments (optional) (variables are supported)
  11. Select the "File" and check "Sheet Name"
  12. Check "Start", "Stop" and "Pause" (optional)
  13. Click "OK"
The Draft Message is saved as a Template in your Current Account and for each Recipient a New Message is automagically saved in your Outbox ("Local Folders -> Outbox"). Ready for Delivery: "File -> Send Unsent Messages" ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Tutorials: (External) Chris Bryson has published two videos: How to Mail Merge with Thunderbird Mail Merge Attachments with Thunderbird Email Raffael Herrmann has published a guide (German): Serienmails mit Thunderbird erstellen ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Deliver Mode: Mail Merge supports "Save as Draft", "Send Later" (default) and "Send Now" as "Deliver Mode" for the individual and personalized messages. Use "Send Now" as "Deliver Mode" at your own risk! It is strongly recommended to use "Send Later" as "Deliver Mode" and to check the individual and personalized messages in the folder "Local Folders -> Outbox". Bugs in Thunderbird, bugs in Mail Merge and bugs in other add-ons may lead to unexpected and undesired results. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Attachments: (Global) Global Attachments, i.e. attachments that are the same for every recipient, can be added normally using the toolbarbutton "Attach". Attachments: (Individual) Individual Attachments, i.e. attachments that are different for every recipient, can be added in the "Attachments" field in the Mail Merge Dialog, e.g.: {{Attachment}} C:\Path\To\File\{{Attachment}} Multiple (individual) attachments can be separated by line breaks, e.g.: C:\Path\To\File\{{Attachment1}} C:\Path\To\File\{{Attachment2}} C:\Path\To\File\{{Attachment3}} ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- CSV: Comma-separated values records are separated by line breaks (\r, \n, \r\n) fields are separated by field delimiters (comma, semicolon, colon, tab) fields may be enclosed within text delimiters (double quote, single quote, none) fields with embedded line breaks must be enclosed within text delimiters fields with embedded field delimiters must be enclosed within text delimiters fields with embedded text delimiters must be enclosed within text delimiters embedded text delimiters must be doubled first record must contain column names CSV: (Example) FirstName,LastName,Gender,Email,Attachment John,Doe,m,john.doe@example.com,C:\MyFile.pdf Character Set: (Recommendation) Character Sets Supported by Thunderbird windows-1252 (Windows) utf-8 (Linux & Mac) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- JSON: (Array of Arrays) Mail Merge supports UTF-8 encoded files in JSON format with Array of Arrays. JSON: (Array of Arrays) (Example) [ ["FirstName","LastName","Gender","Email","Attachment"], ["John","Doe","m","john.doe@example.com","C:\\MyFile.pdf"] ] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Spreadsheet: Support for spreadsheets is based on SheetJS. See: File Formats supported by SheetJS ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Batch: (Start, Stop and Pause) Start: Number of the First Message (optional) Stop: Number of the Last Message (optional) Pause: Pause between Messages in Seconds (optional) (variables are supported) Pause: (Advanced) The "Pause" field supports fixed and random pauses as well as variables, e.g.: Fixed Pause: 10 (Pause 10 seconds) Random Pause: 10-60 (Pause between 10 and 60 seconds) Variables: {{Pause}} ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Send Later: Mail Merge supports Send Later: User Guide ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Line Breaks: Thunderbird uses an HTML editor internally. You can create line breaks with <br>. Links and Images: Thunderbird uses an HTML editor internally. You can create (individual) links and (individual) images with "Insert -> HTML", e.g.: Link: <a href="{{link}}"> Image: <img src="{{image}}"> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Preview File Dialog: Screenshot: Preview File Dialog The "Preview File Dialog" offers you the chance to briefly check the file, i.e. CSV, JSON or Spreadsheet. It is no adequate compensation for inspecting the files themselves! Preview Message Dialog: Screenshot: Preview Message Dialog The "Preview Message Dialog" offers you the chance to briefly check the messages. It is no adequate compensation for inspecting the individual and personalized messages themselves! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Deliver Mode Warning Screenshot: Deliver Mode Warning Use "Send Now" as "Deliver Mode" at your own risk! It is strongly recommended to use "Send Later" as "Deliver Mode" and to check the individual and personalized messages in the folder "Local Folders -> Outbox". Bugs in Thunderbird, bugs in Mail Merge and bugs in other add-ons may lead to unexpected and undesired results. Recipients Reminder: Screenshot: Recipients Reminder The "Recipients Reminder" shall prevent accidentally clicking on "Send Now" or "Send Later". To start Mail Merge please click "Cancel" and use the menu "File -> Mail Merge" or the toolbarbutton "Mail Merge". The "Recipients Reminder" can be activated and deactivated in the Mail Merge Options ("Tools -> Add-ons Preferences -> Mail Merge"). Threshold: extensions.mailmerge.recipients Variables Reminder: Screenshot: Variables Reminder The "Variables Reminder" shall prevent accidentally clicking on "Send Now" or "Send Later". To start Mail Merge please click "Cancel" and use the menu "File -> Mail Merge" or the toolbarbutton "Mail Merge". The "Variables Reminder" can be activated and deactivated in the Mail Merge Options ("Tools -> Add-ons Preferences -> Mail Merge"). ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Variable: {{name}} The variable will be replaced by the value of the field name, e.g.: {{FirstName}}: the variable will be replaced by the value of the field FirstName {{LastName}}: the variable will be replaced by the value of the field LastName {{PrimaryEmail}}: the variable will be replaced by the value of the field PrimaryEmail Variable: {{name|if|then}} If the value of the field name equals if, then the variable will be replaced by then. Variable: {{name|if|then|else}} If the value of the field name equals if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Variable: {{name|*|if|then|else}} (includes) If the value of the field name includes if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Variable: {{name|^|if|then|else}} (starts with) If the value of the field name starts with if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Variable: {{name|$|if|then|else}} (ends with) If the value of the field name ends with if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Variable: {{name|==|if|then|else}} (equal to) (number) If the value of the field name is equal to if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Variable: {{name|>|if|then|else}} (greater than) (number) If the value of the field name is greater than if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Variable: {{name|>=|if|then|else}} (greater than or equal to) (number) If the value of the field name is greater than or equal to if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Variable: {{name|<|if|then|else}} (less than) (number) If the value of the field name is less than if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Variable: {{name|<=|if|then|else}} (less than or equal to) (number) If the value of the field name is less than or equal to if, then the variable will be replaced by then, else by else. Nested Variables: Variables can be nested. For example: To create individual emails only for your premium customers, you can add something like this in the To field: {{Premium|x|{{Email}}}} Warning: (Variables in the From / To / Cc / Bcc / Reply fields) Advanced variables like "includes", "starts with" and "ends with" as well as the "numbers" may not work as expected in the From / To / Cc / Bcc / Reply fields! description.en-US: The Mailredirect extension for Mozilla Thunderbird and Mozilla SeaMonkey adds the ability to redirect one or more email messages to one or more recipients. The feature of email redirecting is also known as remailing or resending. The extension is an answer for bug 12916 Not all email providers support redirection of messages. Most notably Microsoft does not support it at the moment, probably as a measure against SPAM. I think they do this in error, and also reported this to Microsoft, but unfortunately they haven't changed their policy yet. If you run into issues with an email provider not supporting redirection of messages, please contact them and see if you can make them change their policy. You can point them to this add-on, bug 12916, or RFC2822 section 3.6.6. As a workaround you can also redirect your messages through another email provider, e.g. Gmail, but this isn't always desirable, because then that email provider gains access to the messages you redirect, and those messages might contain sensitive information.
description.nl: De Mailredirect-extensie voor Mozilla Thunderbird en Mozilla SeaMonkey voegt de mogelijkheid om een of meerdere berichten te heradresseren naar een of meerdere ontvangers toe. description.hu: Üzenet átirányítás (Mail Redirect) kiegészítő növeli a képes séget a Mozilla Thunderbird és a Mozilla SeaMonkey, hogy irányítsa át egy vagy több üzeneteket egy vagy több címzetteknek. Hibaszám 12916 megoldás.

description.fr: Cette extension affiche l'état du quota IMAP de votre boite mail dans la barre de status de Thunderbird et vous prévient lorsque celui-ci atteint une limite configurable. Display Quota ne fonctionnera que si le serveur IMAP de votre opérateur utilise un quota: faites un clic droit sur votre inbox puis sélectionnez l'onglet "quota" des propriétés de votre boite. Si il y a un quota, c'est gagné. Certains opérateurs utilisent un quota qui n'est pas lié au serveur IMAP. Il n'y a aucun moyen pour Thunderbird de connaitre l'état de celui-ci. Display Quota ne fonctionnera donc pas avec.
description.en-US: This extension will display the current status of your IMAP quota in thunderbird's statusbar and will warn you when you reach a configurable limit. - It will only work if your mail server has an IMAP quota set: right click on your inbox, then in the "quota" tab of the properties, if a quota appears, you're good. Help translate this extension, please contribute on http://babelzilla.org

summary.fr: Cette extension affiche l'état du quota IMAP de votre boite mail dans la barre de status de Thunderbird et vous prévient lorsque celui-ci atteint une limite configurable.

Synchronizes selected addressbooks

Please use latest version from the homepage (http://www.ggbs.de/extensions/) For problems with FTP please see the faq on the homepage.

description.fr: There is a version for TB 60 already, it was sent for review and publishing two months ago. But TB team fail to do the review, thus new version couldn't be downloaded here or updated automatically in TB. You can download it and install manually, from GitHub. Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple. Il suffit d'utiliser le menu déroulant associé aux boutons "Écrire", "Répondre" et "Transférer" et de choisir l'option "Autre papier à lettres…" Vous pouvez utiliser les fichiers de modèles d'Outlook Express, ou bien vous pouvez en écrire vous-mêmes. Si vous souhaitez me faire part de vos commentaires ou me signaler des bogues, écrivez-moi en anglais à cette adresse: arivald@interia.pl (Anglais) Stationery now also works in cooperation with the SmartTemplate4 Add-on, to provide an even richer and better experience. SmartTemplate4 allows you to customize your templates beyond just design, by inserting information from the mail header. Read details on the SmartTemplate4 Add-on page or on its Support Page for Stationery integration.
description.de: There is a version for TB 60 already, it was sent for review and publishing two months ago. But TB team fail to do the review, thus new version couldn't be downloaded here or updated automatically in TB. You can download it and install manually, from GitHub. Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple. Wählen Sie einfach "Andere Vorlage..." aus dem Drop-Down-Menü der Schaltflächen "Neue Nachricht", "Antwort*" und "Weiterleiten". Als Vorlage können Sie die Briefpapier-Dateien von MS OE nutzen, oder eigene erstellen. Für Anregungen oder Fehler benutzen Sie bitte folgende Addresse (auf Englisch): arivald@interia.pl Stationery arbeitet nun mit dem SmartTemplate4 Add-on, zusammen, um eine noch vollständigere Leistung bieten zu können. SmartTemplate4 erlaubt es nicht nur das Design anzupassen, sondern auch die Informationen aus dem e-Mail Header zu verwenden. Details zu dem SmartTemplate4 Add-on sind auf Add-on-Seite oder auf der Support-Seite für die Stationery Integration zu finden.
description.en-US: There is a version for TB 60 already, it was sent for review and publishing two months ago. But TB team fail to do the review, thus new version couldn't be downloaded here or updated automatically in TB. You can download it and install manually, from GitHub. Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple. Simply use drop-down menu from buttons Write, Reply* and Forward, and select Other Stationery... option. As template you may use template files from MS Outlook Express. Or you may write one. By default, last used template become default one. It incorporates idea: Last time used template is probably most liked one. It make all templates sorted, most recently used going on top. But You can change default behavior: simply go to Tools / Stationery options, tab Options, and un-check Enable automatic templates management checkbox. From now, Stationery will not update your list of templates, so default one will stay default until you change it manually in Stationery options. Stationery now also works in cooperation with the SmartTemplate4 Add-on, to provide an even richer and better experience. SmartTemplate4 allows you to customize your templates beyond just design, by inserting information from the mail header. Read details on the SmartTemplate4 Add-on page or on its Support Page for Stationery integration.
description.zh-CN: There is a version for TB 60 already, it was sent for review and publishing two months ago. But TB team fail to do the review, thus new version couldn't be downloaded here or updated automatically in TB. You can download it and install manually, from GitHub. Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple. 只要使用 撰写、回复和转发按钮上的下拉菜单，然后选择“其它信纸...”。 您可以使用MS Outlook Express中的模板文件作为模板，或者自己写一个。 默认情况下会使用最近使用的模板作为默认值，这纳入了以下想法：最近使用的模板很可能是您最喜爱的。所有模板都被有序的排列，最近使用的模板在最上方。 您可以修改默认行为：只要前往 工具/信纸选项，标签选项，并取消“自动管理模板”选项。之后Stationery将不会更新您的模板列表，这样在您从Stationery选项中手动修改之前，默认模板将一直作为默认值。
description.sl: There is a version for TB 60 already, it was sent for review and publishing two months ago. But TB team fail to do the review, thus new version couldn't be downloaded here or updated automatically in TB. You can download it and install manually, from GitHub. Or You can build it on Your own, it is simple. Preprosto uporabite spustni meni gumbov Sestavi, Odgovori in Posreduj, in izberite "Druga predloga ...". Kot predloge lahko uporabite datoteke predlog iz programa MS Outlook Express. Ali pa lahko eno napišete. Privzeto nazadnje uporabljena predloga postane privzeta. Vključuje idejo: nazadnje uporabljena predloga je verjetno najljubša. Vse predloge so razvrščene, z nazadnje uporabljeno postavljeno na vrh. Toda privzeto obnašanje lahko spremenite: preprosto pojdite na Orodja / Možnosti Stationery, Možnosti zavihkov, in odznačite nastavitev "Samodejno upravljaj s predlogami". Od zdaj naprej Stationery ne be več posodabljal seznama predlog, tako da bo privzeta predloga ostala privzeta, dokler je ročno ne spremenite v možnostih Stationery. Stationary sedaj sodeluje tudi z dodatkom SmartTemplate4, da vam priskrbi še bogatejšo in boljšo izkušnjo. SmartTemplate vam omogoča prilagoditev vaših predlog onstran oblikovanja, z vnašanjem podatkov iz glav sporočil. Preberite si podrobnosti na strani dodatka SmartTemplate4 ali na njegovi podporni strani za povezovanje s Stationary.
description.pl: Istnieje już wersja Stationery dla TB 60, została przesłana do recenzji i opublikowania dwa miesiące temu. Zespół TB nie zrobił recenzji, dlatego nowa wersja nie może być pobrana tutaj lub zaktualizowana automatycznie w TB. Możesz nową wersję zainstalować ręcznie, z GitHuba. Lub po prostu zbudować ze źródeł. Po prostu użyj rozwijanego menu z przycisków Napisz, Odpowiedz* lub Przekaż, i wybierz opcję Inna papeteria.... Jako papeterię możesz użyć papeterię z Outlook Expressa. Możesz też utworzyć nową, w pliku HTML. Domyślnie ostatnio użyta papeteria staje się papeterią domyślną. To odzwierciedla ideę: Ostatnio użyta jest prawdopodobnie najbardziej potrzebna. W efekcie lista papeterii jest posortowana of najbardziej potrzebnej do najmniej potrzebnej. Ale oczywiście możesz to zmieć w opcjach, i ustalić stałą kolejność papeterii. Dodatek Stationery może także współdziałać z dodatkiem SmartTemplate4, w celu zwiększenia możliwości papeterii. SmartTemplate4 pozwala na dostosowanie papeterii poza wygląd i design. Więcej na stronie wsparcia SmartTemplate4.

description.en-US:
Confirm-Address is Thunderbird Add-on that shows the confirm-address dialog when you send a mail. Once you register YOUR DOMAIN (ex."mycompany.com"), you will see Confirm-Address dialog with highlighted mail addresses when you send mail to other domain. And so, you can raise awareness of security and information leak. [Nov. 13, 2018 For Thunderbird 60 users] It is with great appreciation, I announce that Confirm-Address 1.3.0 which supports Thunderbird 60.* is now available. I thank all the Confirm-Address users for your patience. [Nov. 14, 2018 For Thunderbird 59.* users] An inappropriate behavior is found in Confirm-Address 1.3.0 runs on Thunderbird 59.* that no setting is saved and all the recipients will be treated as other domains. Thunderbird 59.* users are kindly advised to use Confirm-Address 1.2.9.* instead of 1.3.0. [How to Install]
  • Download addon file (extension = xpi) from this site or support site.
  • Click "Thunderbird menubar > Tools > Addon" to open addon page.
  • Drag & drop downloaded addon file to addon page.
[Help Wanted] Looking for someone who can donate his/her talent for translate texts to his/her own language. Please contact Meatian.
description.de: Confirm-Address ist das Thunderbird-Add-On, das bestimmte Dialoge anzeigt, damit Benutzer überprüfen können, ob es einen falschen Empfänger oder fehlende Empfänger gibt.
description.pt-BR: Confirm-Address é o complemento do Thunderbird com determinados diálogos para que os usuários verifiquem se não há destinatários errados ou se faltam destinatários.
description.ja:
Confirm-Addressは、メールを送信する前にあて先確認ダイアログを表示するThunderbirdアドオンです。また、あらかじめ自分が属する組織のドメイン(例えば"mycompany.com"など、自分の会社のドメイン名)を登録しておくことで、組織外にメールを送る場合は、送信前にそのメールアドレスが強調表示されるため、情報漏洩に対する意識を高めることができます。 [2018.11.13 Thunderbird ver.60をお使いの方々へ] Thunderbird 60.* に対応したConfirm-Address 1.3.0をようやく公開しました。 [2018.11.14 Thunderbird ver.59.*をお使いの方々へ] Confirm-Address 1.3.0をインストールすると設定内容が保存されないという不具合が見つかりました。Thunderbird 59.* をお使いの方は従来のThunderbird 1.2.9.* をご利用ください。 [インストールの手順]
  • このサイト、もしくはサポートサイトからアドオンファイル(拡張子 .xpi)をダウンロードする
  • Thunderbirdの[ツール > アドオン]を選択し、アドオンページを開く
  • ダウンロードしたアドオンファイルをThunderbirdのアドオンページにドラッグ＆ドロップする
[お手伝い募集] ・このアドオンを各言語に翻訳してくださる方 Meatianまでご連絡下さい。

description.it:
La Posta Elettronica Certificata (PEC) nasce per sostituire il servizio di posta raccomandata nella comunicazione tra i professionisti, i cittadini e le istituzioni rendendo più efficiente il meccanismo di comunicazione. Il sistema, basandosi sullo standard S/MIME, certifica lo scambio di documenti tra il mittente e il destinatario della comunicazione e informa automaticamente il mittente sullo stato della comunicazione fornendo ricevute che hanno valenza legale. ThunderPEC si propone come strumento per la gestione semplificata della posta elettronica certificata in Thunderbird e può essere abilitato selettivamente sui soli account PEC. Un messaggio di posta elettronica certificata è costituito da una Busta di Trasporto che contiene il messaggio di posta elettronica originale inviato dal mittente ed un allegato XML che riassume i dati della transazione. La busta di trasporto è firmata digitalmente dal gestore PEC sorgente. ThunderPEC visualizza direttamente il messaggio di posta elettronica originale e offre gli strumenti per poter operare sul messaggio originale. Inoltre, gestisce le notifiche PEC inviate dai gestori PEC coinvolti nella transazione. ThunderPEC semplifica la gestione delle notifiche PEC e delle ricevute PCT e FatturaPA, attraverso la funzionalità Stato del messaggio che permette di avere una visione di insieme/riassuntiva delle notifiche associate ad un messaggio inviato. ThunderPEC introduce tre filtri rapidi (Messaggi, Notifiche, 53/94) che permettono la selezione rapida dei soli messaggi PEC, delle sole notifiche PEC o dei messaggi PEC conenenti notifiche secondo la Legge 53/94. ThunderPEC implementa, inoltre, le seguenti funzionalità:
  • Archiviazione delle notifiche PEC e ricevute PCT/FatturaPA che offre la possibilità di salvare le notifiche PEC associate ad un messaggio, le ricevute PCT/FatturaPA ed il messaggio stesso all'interno di un file zip per l'archiviazione.
  • Cerca PA per ricercare l'indirizzo PEC di un ufficio pubblico sull'infrastruttura Open Data di DigitPA (spcdata.digitpa.gov.it).
  • Trasferisci Account per trasferire i dati di un account PEC da ThunderPEC a PocketPEC.
ThunderPEC introduce, all'interno del menu principale, il menu ThunderPEC, composto da: 1) Account: per la gestione degli account PEC. 1.a) Aggiungi: per aggiungere un nuovo account PEC. Semplifica la creazione di un nuovo account per i gestori preconfigurati (Aruba PEC, Legalmail, Postecert, Vodafone PEC, Telecom Italia PEC, PostaCertificat@, pec.istruzione.it, pec.notariato.it, postacertificata.notariato.it). 1.b) Seleziona: per abilitare/disabilitare ThunderPEC sugli account già esistenti. 2) Tipo di ricevuta: per selezionare il tipo di ricevuta di consegna desiderata. 3) P7M: per attivare/disattivare la funzionalità per la correzione del bug sugli allegati p7m di Thunderbird. 4) PocketPEC: per trasferire un account PEC da ThunderPEC a PocketPEC in modalità keyless. 5) Condividi/Seguici: per l'interazione attraverso i social network (ad esempio, Facebook, Twitter). 6) Aiuto: per visualizzare la guida. 7) Invia email al supporto: per inviare un email al supporto di ThunderPEC. 8) Informazioni su ThunderPEC: per visualizzare la versione dell'estensione e ulteriori informazioni aggiuntive. Inoltre, per poter operare direttamente sul messaggio originale contenuto all'interno di un messaggio PEC e gestire i dati di certificazione e le ricevute, ThunderPEC aggiunge i seguenti elementi: a) Il sottomenu ThunderPEC al menu Messaggio di Thunderbird b) Il sottomenu ThunderPEC all'interno del menu contestuale c) La toolbar di gestione all'interno della finestra del messaggio d) Il menu Thunderpec all'interno della finestra di composizione di un nuovo messaggio BLOG: http://thunderpec.wordpress.com Facebook: BLOG: https://www.facebook.com/ThunderPEC

description.el: Η περιήγηση στα DOM μπορεί να γίνει μέσω ενός παραθύρου δύο τμημάτων, όπου προβάλλεται μια ποικιλία διαφορετικών απόψεων του εγγράφου και όλων των κόμβων εντός αυτού. Μπορούν να επιθεωρηθούν η δομή και οι ιδιότητες ενός παραθύρου και των περιεχομένων του από πολλές απόψεις. Όλες οι συνεισφορές για την επέκταση αυτή πηγαίνουν στο Ίδρυμα Mozilla. Το Ίδρυμα Mozilla προωθεί τη διαφάνεια, την καινοτομία και τη συμμετοχή στο Διαδίκτυο. Μπορείτε να μάθετε περισσότερα στη διεύθυνση www.mozilla.org/foundation.
description.en-US:
Inspects the structure and properties of a window and its contents with a variety of views. All contributions for this add-on go to the Mozilla Foundation. Mozilla promotes openness, innovation and participation on the Internet. Learn more at www.mozilla.org/foundation. Extensions that extend the DOM Inspector:
  • InspectorWidget
  • Element Inspector
  • Stacked Inspector

developer_comments.en-US: DOM Inspector is a mozilla.org project. File reports for bugs, feature requests, and translation updates on bugzilla.mozilla.org (Product: Other Applications, Component: DOM Inspector). Contact Neil Rashbrook, #seamonkey on irc.mozilla.org, or anyone in the Mozilla community for help contributing to the DOM Inspector.

caption.en-US: Several methods to choose a document to inspect.
Inspect content documents loaded in browser tabs or in a mail message pane.
Inspect Mozilla chrome as well. (A Mozilla application's interface, including widgets like buttons, tabs, and menus, comprise the "chrome".)
Edit the attributes on chrome nodes to alter elements and behavior of the interface as you're running the application.
Search for a specific node in the document with a few different methods.
Examine and modify the style rules that affect the style of content or chrome elements.
Use DOM Inspector viewers to look at different aspects of the document from various perspectives.
Change the viewer to look at different aspects of a given node from various perspectives.

summary.sk: Umožní preskúmať štruktúru a vlastnosti okna a jeho obsahu.
summary.el: Ο Επιθεωρητής DOM είναι ένα εργαλείο που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για έλεγχο και επεξεργασία ζωντανών DOM κάθε εγγράφου ιστού ή εφαρμογής XUL.
summary.en-US: DOM Inspector is a tool that can be used to inspect and edit the live DOM of any web document or XUL application. The DOM can be navigated using a two-paned window displaying a variety of different views on the document and all nodes within.
