description.en-US: Xpunge is an extension that combines the functionality of emptying certain folders (trash and junk) and also compacting user-specified folders in a single action and for multiple accounts. This can be done with a single mouse click on a toolbar button or through a sub-menu under Thunderbird's "Tools" menu. The functionality to empty junk folders is available since version 0.5. Xpunge can be invoked either on the currently selected account only ("Xpunge" button) or on a configurable list of multiple Thunderbird accounts ("MultiXpunge" button). There is also a separately configurable timer feature that allows the functionality offered by "MultiXpunge" to be automatically applied at regular intervals and at a specific time every day. Xpunge works on all types of Thunderbird accounts. ATTENTION: Compacting folders means that all the messages you have previously deleted from those folders are permanently deleted from the hard disk and cannot be retrieved again. ATTENTION: Be careful when you use the new functionality for emptying the junk folders. It is not the same as emptying the trash folder, in the sense that messages are deleted on purpose, whereas your spam filter may put useful (non-spam) emails in the junk folder, so emptying this folder will cause you to lose those emails. Xpunge has all the new junk features turned off by default to avoid accidents. Please enable and use the junk functionality at your own risk. ATTENTION: When you select to empty the Junk of an account, all the folders of that account that are known to Thunderbird to be "junk" folders will be emptied. For example, if you set up a Gmail IMAP account, where the junk folder is called "Spam", and you also change the settings of that account in Thunderbird to move new junk messages to a folder called "Junk", both folders will be emptied if you enable emptying the Junk for that account in Xpunge.
description.es:
Xpunge es una extensión que combina las funcionalidades de vaciar la papelera y compactar las carpetas en una única acción. Puede realizar esta tarea con un único click del ratón en el botón de la barra de herramientas, o usando el submenú correspondiente en el menú "Herramientas" de Thunderbird.

Xpunge puede actuar tanto en una única cuenta seleccionada (botón "Xpunge") o en una lista configurable con varias cuentas (botón "MultiXpunge"). Existe también una opción configurable de programador, que permite aplicar automáticamente la funcionalidad de "MultiXpunge" en intervalos regulares y a una hora concreta cada día.

Xpunge funciona con todos los tipos de cuentas de Thunderbird.
description.da:
Xpunge er en udvidelse, som i én handling kombinerer funktionerne tøm papirkurv og optimer mapper. Dette kan gøres med et enkelt klik på en knap på værktøjslinjen eller ved at vælge en undermenu til menuen Funktioner i Thunderbird.

Xpunge kan udføres på den pågældende konto (knappen "Xpunge") eller på en brugerdefineret liste over flere Thunderbird-konti (knappen "Mulitxpunge"). Der er også en selvstændig brugerdefineret timer-funktion, som lader funktionen fra "MultiXpunge" udføre automatisk med regelmæssige intervaller og på et bestemt tidspunkt hver dag.

Xpunge virker på alle slags Thunderbird-konti.

developer_comments.en-US: ATTENTION: Compacting folders means that all the messages you have previously deleted from those folders are permanently deleted from the hard disk and cannot be retrieved again. ATTENTION: Be careful when you use the new functionality for emptying the junk folders. It is not the same as emptying the trash folder, in the sense that messages are deleted on purpose, whereas your spam filter may put useful (non-spam) emails in the junk folder, so emptying this folder will cause you to lose those emails. Xpunge has all the new junk features turned off by default to avoid accidents. Please enable and use the junk functionality at your own risk. ATTENTION: When you select to empty the Junk of an account, all the folders of that account that are known to Thunderbird to be "junk" folders will be emptied. For example, if you set up a Gmail IMAP account, where the junk folder is called "Spam", and you also change the settings of that account in Thunderbird to move new junk messages to a folder called "Junk", both folders will be emptied if you enable emptying the Junk for that account in Xpunge. The two buttons offered by Xpunge do not appear on the main Thunderbird toolbar by default, you will have to add them yourself. Also, the button icons contained in the package offered here are of size 16x16 (small) and 24x24 (large) pixels. If these icons are smaller than what your current theme is using, you can find a version with slightly larger icons on Xpunge's homepage. For usage information and more details about this extension, please visit Xpunge's homepage: http://www.theodoretegos.net/mozilla/tb/index.html

description.en-US: +++ Quick install: +++ Install Lightning and ThunderBirthDay, then create a new local calendar choosing ThunderBirthDay as provider. +++ Problems with Thunderbird 29+: +++ The wizard to create new calendars of Thunderbird 29 and above was broken. The new version 0.8.1 fixes this problem. Everything should work fine again! +++ Prerequisites: +++ The Lightning extension needs to be installed. +++ How to use: +++ Create a new calendar in Lightning by clicking File>New>Calendar... in the menu bar. Then choose "On My Computer" as location and "Birthdays from the Thunderbird addressbook" as type for your calendar. Also specify the address book to use as a source for birthdays. Finally choose a name for the new calendar. Now open the "Edit Card" dialog of an address book card, go to the "Private" tab and set the birthday including the year. Note that these changes don't take effect in the calendar until it gets reloaded. To do this either restart Thunderbird or right click on a calendar from the list, then choose "Reload Remote Calendars". Also note that the events generated by ThunderBirthDay cannot be modified with Lightning for the moment. Maybe future versions of the extension will be bidirectional. +++ Any questions? +++ If you have any questions about how to install or use the extension, about technical details, bugs or anything else, please let me know! Suggestions for new features are also very welcome! Just send me a mail to thunderbirthday@(mydomain) replacing (mydomain) by ingomueller.net. +++ Localizing: +++ If you wish to add a translation for a new language or if you found a mistake in an existing one (including the one in English), I'd be really glad, if you could have a look at the translation portal Babelzilla. Thanks a lot!
description.de: +++ Schnellinstallation: +++ Installieren Sie Lightning und ThunderBirthDay. Erstellen Sie dann einen neuen lokalen Kalender, bei dem Sie ThunderBirthDay als Typ einstellen. +++ Problems with Thunderbird 29+: +++ The wizard to create new calendars of Thunderbird 29 and above was broken. The new version 0.8.1 fixes this problem. Everything should work fine again! +++ Vorraussetzungen: +++ Die Lightning-Extension muss installiert sein. +++ Anleitung: +++ Erstellen Sie in Lightning einen neuen Kalender, in dem Sie in der Menüleiste auf Datei>Neu>Kalender... klicken. Wählen Sie dann "Auf Meinem Computer" als Ort und "Geburtstage aus Thunderbird-Adressbuch" als Typ aus. Geben Sie auch das Adressbuch an, das als Quelle für Geburtstage verwendet werden soll. Schließlich können Sie einen Namen für den neuen Kalender angeben. Öffnen Sie jetzt den Bearbeiten-Dialog einer Karte aus dem Adressbuch, wählen Sie den Reiter "Privat" aus und geben Sie den Geburtstag inklusive Jahr an. Die Änderungen dort werden im Kalender erst übernommen, wenn dieser neu geladen wurde. Dies erreicht man, indem man Thunderbird neu startet oder auf einen Kalender aus der Liste rechtsklickt und "Externe Kalender neu laden" auswählt. Beachten Sie, dass die Ereignisse, die ThunderBirthDay generiert im Moment nicht mit Lightning bearbeitet werden können. Vielleicht werden zukünftige Versionen der Extension in beide Richtungen funktionieren. +++ Fragen? +++ Wenn Sie Fragen jeglicher Art über Installation, Benutzung oder technische Details haben, einen Fehler gefunden haben oder Feedback abgeben wollen, melden Sie sich bitte bei mir! Vorschläge für neue Versionen sind auch sehr willkommen! Senden Sie mir einfach eine Email an thunderbirthday@(meinedomain), wobei (meinedomain) durch ingomueller.net ersetzt werden muss.
description.it: +++ Installazione veloce +++ Installate Lightning e ThunderBirthDay, quindi create un nuovo calendario locale selezionandolo ThunderBirthDay come provider. +++ Problems with Thunderbird 29+: +++ The wizard to create new calendars of Thunderbird 29 and above was broken. The new version 0.8.1 fixes this problem. Everything should work fine again! +++ Requisiti +++ È necessario installare semplicemnte Lightning. +++ Utilizzo +++ Create un nuovo calendario in Lightning facendo clic sul menu File>Nuovo>Calendario... nella barra dei menu. Quindi selezionate come destinazione "Sul mio computer" e "Compleanni dei contatti presenti nelle rubriche" come tipo di calendario. Specificate le rubriche dalle quali estrarre i compleanni e il nome del nuovo calendario. Aprite la finestra di un contatto e impostate la data di nascita tra le opzioni presenti nella scheda "Privato". Per poter visualizzare il compleanno sarà necessario aggiornarlo riavviando Thunderbird o facendo clic con il tasto destro del mouse su un calendario e selezionando "Ricarica calendari remoti". Allo stato attuale non è possibile modificare gli eventi generati da ThunderBirthDay direttamente da Lightning. Questa funzione potrebbe essere disponibile nelle prossime versioni. +++ Domande e commenti +++ Se avete dubbi, domande o richieste per nuove funzioni, non esitate a contattarmi (in inglese o tedesco). Sarò lieto di esservi di aiuto per risolvere eventuali bug o problemi di installazione, e rispondere a domande sui dettagli tecnici. Inviatemi un messaggio di posta elettronica all'indirizzo thunderbirthday@(mydomain) sostituendo ingomueller.net a (mydomain). ++ Traduzione +++ Se volete proporre migliorie alla traduzione italiana, rivolgetevi alla comunità di Mozilla Italia, segnalando le proposte nella sezione dedicata alle estensioni. Se desiderate aggiungere una traduzione in un'altra lingua o migliorare la versione inglese, potrete rivolgervi al portale di traduzione Babelzilla. Grazie mille.

developer_comments.en-US:
PLEASE review my code! Look at the readme.txt file in the XPI to see details about the development.

Developpers may want to increase verbosity by changing extensions.thunderbirthday.verbosity in the about:config dialog (0 means only exceptions are being reported, 5 means the error console is flooded with information).
developer_comments.it:
Ho bisogno di suggerimenti e commenti quindi per favore controllate e rivedete il mio codice! Nel file readme.txt all'interno del file XPI potete trovare dettagli in merito allo sviluppo dell'estensione.

Gli sviluppatori possono cambiare il parametro extensions.thunderbirthday.verbosity nella finestra dei parametri "about:config" (impostando il valore su "0", riporterà solo le eccezioni mentre con il valore "5" si riempirà di informazioni la console degli errori).

description.ru: Сова позволяет вам использовать учетную запись Exchange, поддерживающую Outlook Web Access (OWA), через Thunderbird. После настройки вы сможете увидеть свою учётную запись прямо в Thunderbird. Вы сможете писать и читать электронные письма, используя свой аккаунт Exchange. Это платное дополнение, стоимость которого составляет 10€. Первый месяц пользования – бесплатный, поэтому вы всегда можете скачать и оценить приложение самостоятельно. Разработчики данного дополнения участвовали в разработке Thunderbird как Open Source, и они активно работали с Thunderbird и его предшественником в течение последних двадцати лет. Данное дополнение – это способ заработать на жизнь. https://www.beonex.com/owl/
description.fr: Chouette vous permet d'utiliser vos adresses mail Exchange qui utilisent Outlook Web Access (OWA) avec Thunderbird. Après l'installation, votre compte devrait apparaître dans Thunderbird, tout comme les autres comptes. Vous pouvez désormais lire et écrire vos e-mails avec votre adresse mail Exchange. Cette extension est payante. Elle coûte 10 EUR/an. Le premier mois est gratuit, pour que vous puissiez tester l'extension et voir si vous l'appréciez. Les développeurs de cette extension ont contribué à Thunderbird en tant qu'Open Source. Ils sont actifs autour de Thunderbird et ses prédécesseurs depuis de nombreuses années, en partie depuis presque 20 ans. Mais Chouette doit aussi gagner sa vie. https://www.beonex.com/owl/
description.de: Ermöglicht Ihnen, Ihre Emails auf Exchange-Servern mit Outlook Web Access (OWA) über Thunderbird abzurufen. Nach dem Einrichten sollte Ihr Konto wie alle anderen Email-Konten in Thunderbird angezeigt werden. Sie können Ihre Emails lesen und schreiben. Dies ist ein kostenpflichtiges Addon. Es kostet 10 Eur/Jahr. Der erste Monat ist kostenlos, damit Sie es testen können, ob es Ihnen gefällt. Die Entwickler dieses Addons haben etliche Teile von Thunderbird als Open-Source beigetragen, und sind seit vielen Jahren bei Thunderbird und seinem Vorgänger aktiv, teils seit fast 20 Jahren. Dies ist ein Versuch, den Lebensunterhalt zu verdienen. https://www.beonex.com/owl/
description.nl:
Maakt het mogelijk om Exchange e-mailaccounts die gebruik maken van Outlook Web Access (OWA) te gebruiken met Thunderbird. Na het installeren, zou uw account moeten verschijnen in Thunderbird zoals de andere accounts. U kunt emails lezen en schrijven met uw Exchange account.

Dit is een betaalde addon. Het kost 10 EUR/jaar. De eerste maand is gratis, zo kunt u proberen of het iets voor u is.

De ontwikkelaars van deze addon hebben bijgedragen aan onderdelen van Thunderbird als Open Source, en zij zijn sinds vele jaren actief rondom Thunderbird en zijn voorgangers, in gedeelten al bijna 20 jaar. Dit is een poging om de kost te verdienen.
description.pt-PT: A Coruja permite o uso das suas contas de e-mail Exchange que utilizam o Outlook Web Access (OWA) com o Thunderbird. Depois da configuração, a sua conta deve aparecer no Thunderbird como quaisquer outras contas de e-mail. Você pode ler e escrever e-mails com a sua conta Exchange. Esta é uma extensão paga. Ela custa 10 euros ao ano. O primeiro mês é gratuito para testar e ver se gostou da extensão. Os desenvolvedores dessa extensão contribuiram muito ao Thunderbird como Open Source, e eles são ativos na comunidade do Thunderbird e de seus antecessores há anos, mais especificamente há 20 anos. Esta é uma tentativa de ganhar a nossa vida. https://www.beonex.com/owl/
description.en-US: Allows you to use your Exchange email accounts that use Outlook Web Access (OWA) with Thunderbird. After setup, your account should appear in Thunderbird just like the other accounts. You can read and write emails with your Exchange account. This is a paid addon. It costs 10 EUR/year. The first month is free, so that you can test it and see whether you like it. The developers of this addon have contributed many parts to Thunderbird as Open Source, and they are active around Thunderbird and its predecessor since many years, in part since almost 20 years. This is an attempt to earn a living. https://www.beonex.com/owl/
description.it: Gufo ti permette di usare il tuo account email di Exchange che usa Outlook Web Access (OWA) con Thunderbird. Dopo averlo impostato, il tuo account apparirà su Thunderbird come ogni altro account. Potrai leggere e scrivere email con il tuo account Exchange. È un componente aggiuntivo a pagamento. Costa 10€ all’anno. Il primo mese è gratis, così potrai testarlo e vedere se ti è utile. Gli sviluppatori di questo componente hanno contribuito in molti modi a Thundrbird come volontari Open Source e sono attivi su Thunderbird e il suo predecessore da tanti anni, alcuni da quasi 20 anni. È un modo per guadagnarsi da vivere. https://www.beonex.com/owl/
description.hu: A Bagoly lehetővé teszi, hogy az Outlook Web Access (az Outlook webes hozzáférése, OWA) Exchange-fiókok használhatók legyenek a Thunderbird szolgáltatással. A telepítés után a fiókja a Thunderbirdben jelenik meg, mint a többi fiók. E-maileket olvashat és írhat az Exchange-fiókjával. Ez egy fizetett kiegészítő. 10 euró évente költséget jelent. Az első hónap ingyenes, így tesztelheti és megnézheti, hogy tetszik-e. Ennek a bővítménynek a fejlesztőinek számos része nyílt forráskódként hozzájárult a Thunderbirdhez, és sok éve aktívak a Thunderbird és elődei körében, részben közel 20 éve. https://www.beonex.com/owl/?lang=hu
description.pt-BR: A Coruja permite o uso das suas contas de e-mail Exchange que utilizam o Outlook Web Access (OWA) com o Thunderbird. Depois da configuração, a sua conta deve aparecer no Thunderbird como quaisquer outras contas de e-mail. Você pode ler e escrever e-mails com a sua conta Exchange. Esta é uma extensão paga. Ela custa 10 euros ao ano. O primeiro mês é gratuito para testar e ver se gostou da extensão. Os desenvolvedores dessa extensão contribuiram muito ao Thunderbird como Open Source, e eles são ativos na comunidade do Thunderbird e de seus antecessores há anos, mais especificamente há 20 anos. Esta é uma tentativa de ganhar a nossa vida. https://www.beonex.com/owl/
description.pl: Sowa z poziomu Thunderbirda daje możliwość używania twoich kont e-mail w programie Exchange Server, które korzystają z Outlook Web Access (OWA). Po instalacji Twoje konto powinno pojawić się w Thunderbirdzie, podobnie jak inne konta. Możesz odbierać i wysyłać e-maile z konta Exchange. Jest to płatny program, który kosztuje 10 EUR/rok. Pierwszy miesiąc jest darmowy, żeby przetestować program i upewnić się, że jest dla Ciebie odpowiedni. Autorzy tego programu opracowali wiele elementów Thunderbirda jako deweloperzy Open Source, pracują oni w otoczeniu Thunderbirda i jego poprzedników od wielu lat, przy niektórych elementach nawet od 20 lat. Chcemy symbolicznie zarobić w oparciu o naszą wiedzę i doświadczenie. https://www.beonex.com/owl/
description.ja:
フクロウは、Outlook Web Access (OWA) を使用するExchangeメールアカウントでThunderbirdも併用できるようにするものです。設定後、あなたのアカウントはThunderbirdに他のアカウントと同様に表示されます。 Exchangeアカウント上ではメールを読んだり書いたりすることができます。

これは有料のアドオンです。料金は年間10€です。最初の月の使用料は無料ですので、このプログラムに満足いただけるかどうかお試し期間として使用していただくことができます。

このアドオンの開発者はThunderbirdプログラムに関し、数多くの部分でオープンソースとして貢献しており、Thunderbird及びその前身に関して現役で何年もの間、人によっては20年近くも活動し続けています。そのため、フクロウは私たちがこれで生計を立てようという試みなのです。
description.es: Aluco le permite usar sus cuentas de correo electrónico de Exchange que usan Outlook Web Access (OWA) con Thunderbird. Después de la configuración, su cuenta debería aparecer en Thunderbird al igual que las otras cuentas. Puede leer y escribir correos electrónicos con su cuenta de Exchange. Este es un complemento pagado. Cuesta 10 EUR / año. El primer mes es gratis, para que pueda probarlo sin compromiso y ver si le gusta. Los desarrolladores de este complemento han contribuido en muchas partes en Thunderbird como Open Source y llevan activos alrededor de Thunderbird y su predecesor muchos años, hace casi 20 años. Este es un intento de ganarse la vida. https://www.beonex.com/owl/

description.en-US:
The missing Thunderbird "copy folder" feature!  Copy any folder and its contents (i.e. subfolders and messages) to any location while maintaining folder structure. Copy an entire POP/IMAP account to your Local Folders as a backup.

Copy Folder does not overwrite any messages or folders. If the folder being copied already exists in the destination location, Copy Folder merges the folders, only copying messages and subfolders that aren't already in the destination folder.

Merge multiple folders or accounts into one location. Migrate accounts from one server to another. Use it to free up space in your Gmail account, Google Apps account or other IMAP account while keeping a useable local backup of all your email.

IMPORTANT: Before using Copy Folder, go to "Tools > Account Settings > Synchronization & Storage" and make sure "Keep messages for this account on the computer" is checked. If you did not previously keep your messages on the computer, you should wait until Thunderbird downloads your messages before copying any folders, otherwise you may experience duplicate copied messages.

caption.en-US: Right-click on any folder/account/server and choose where to copy to.
Copy Folder displays the number of messages in the source folder that aren't in the destination folder and confirms your selection.
Copy progress displayed in the bottom right corner.
Copy Folder notifies you when copying is complete.

summary.en-US: The missing Thunderbird "copy folder" feature!  Copy folders or entire POP/IMAP accounts recursively to any location while maintaining folder structure.

description.fr: DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) est une méthode autorise les domaines a signer les emails. Ce module vérifie les signatures DKIM et affiche le résultate dans l'entête du courriel. Ainsi il est possible de visualiser la vérification du domaine et identifier les responsabiltés pour courriel spécifiquement. L'affichage du résultat peut être changer dans les options. Il est important de noter que ce mail peut être signer par un domaine arbitraire. Une signature DKIM valide seule n'est pas un indicateur d'un courriel authentique. Toujours vérifier le signataire pour déterminer si ce courriel est sûr! Dans certains cas, l'absence de signatures DKIM peut être pratique pour identifier une arnaque. Si vous connaissez certains domaines qui signe tous les courriels avec DKIM, l'absence de signature DKIM est un indictauer fort d'un courriel corrompu Pour faciliter la vérification de qui a signé un courriel, ce module supporte des règles de signatures. Avec des règles de signatures, il est possible de spécifier que les courriels envoyés de certains expéditeurs sont toujours signés pour certains domaines (veuillez vous référer au SDID). En savoir plus a propos des règles de signatures à https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Sign-rules. Une description de toutes les options disponibles peut être trouvés à https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Options.
description.de: DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) ist eine Methode, die es Domains erlaubt E-Mails zu signieren. Das Add-on überprüft diese DKIM Signaturen und zeigt das Ergebnis in der Kopfzeile der E-Mail an. Auf diese Weise ist es möglich zu sehen, welche Domain Verantwortung für eine bestimmte E-Mail übernimmt. Die Art und Weise wie das Ergebnis angezeigt wird, kann in den Einstellungen geändert werden. Es ist wichtig zu beachten, dass eine E-Mail durch eine beliebige Domain signiert seinen kann. Eine gültige Signatur alleine ist daher kein Hinweis auf eine vertrauenswürdige E-Mail. Um zu entscheiden ob eine E-Mail vertrauenswürdig ist sollte immer überprüft werden wer der Signierende ist! In einigen Fällen kann die Abwesenheit einer DKIM Signatur nützlich sein um betrügerische E-Mails zu erkennen. Falls bekannt ist, dass eine Domain alle ihre E-Mails mittels DKIM signiert, ist das Nichtvorhandensein einer DKIM Signatur ein starker Hinweis auf eine gefälschte E-Mail. Um das Überprüfen zu vereinfachen, ob und durch wen eine E-Mail signiert ist, unterstützt das Add-on Signierregeln. Mittels der Signierregeln ist es möglich festzulegen, dass E-Mails von einem bestimmtem Sender immer von einer vorgegebenen Domain (auch genannt SDID) signiert sein müssen. Mehr zu den Signierregeln in Englisch auf https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Sign-rules. Eine Beschreibung aller vorhandenen Add-on Einstellungen kann in Englisch auf https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Options gefunden werden.
description.en-US: DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) is a method which allows domains to sign e-mails. The add-on verifies these DKIM signatures and shows the result in the e-mail header. This way it is possible to see which domain is claiming responsibility for a specific e-mail. How the result is shown can be changed in the options. It is important to note that an e-mail can be signed by an arbitrary domains. A valid DKIM signature alone is therefore not an indicator for a trustworthy e-mail. Always check who the signer is to determine if an e-mail is trustworthy! In some cases, the absence of a DKIM signature can be useful to identify scam e-mails. If it is known that a certain domain is signing all its e-mails with DKIM, the absence of a DKIM signature is a strong indicator for a forged e-mail. To ease the checking of if and by who an e-mail is signed, the add-on supports the use of sign rules. With sign rules it is possible to specify that e-mails from a certain sender have to be always signed by a specific domain (also referred to as SDID). More about sign rules at https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Sign-rules. A description of all the available add-on options can be found at https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Options.
description.it: DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) è una tecnica di firma delle email da parte dei domini. Il componente aggiuntivo verifica queste firme DKIM e mostra i risultati di questa verifica nell’intestazione dell’email. In questo modo è possibile visualizzare quale dominio rivendica la responsibilità di una specifica email. La modalità di visualizzazione dei risultati può essere modificata nelle opzioni. È importante notare che un’email può essere firmata da domini arbitrari. Una firma DKIM valida da sola non è quindi un’indicatore di un’email attendibile. È sempre opportuno verificare chi ha firmato per determinare se un’email è attendibile! In alcuni casi l’assenza di una firma DKIM può essere utile per identificare email fraudolente. Se si sa che un dominio firma tutte le sue email con DKIM, l’assenza di una firma DKIM è un significativo indicatore di un’email contraffatta. Per facilitare la verifica sia della presenza della firma sia del suo mittente, il componente aggiuntivo supporta le regole delle firme. Con tali regole è possibile specificare che le email provenienti da un determinato mittente devono essere sempre firmate da uno specifico dominio (chiamato anche SDID). Ulteriori informazioni sulle regole delle firme sono disponibili qui: https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Sign-rules Una descrizione di tutte le opzioni del componente aggiuntivo possono essere trovate qui: https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Options
description.hu: A DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail – TartományKulcsok azonosított levelek) egy olyan módszer, amely lehetővé teszi a tartománynak, hogy e-maileket írjon alá. A kiegészítő ellenőrzi ezeket a DKIM aláírásokat, és megjeleníti az eredményt az e-mail fejlécében. Ily módon láthatjuk, hogy melyik tartomány állítja felelősséget egy adott e-mailért. Az eredmény megjelenítésének módja az opciókban megváltoztatható. Fontos megjegyezni, hogy az e-maileket tetszőleges tartomány aláírhatja. Ezért önmagában az érvényes DKIM aláírás nem jelzi a megbízható e-maileket. Mindig ellenőrizze, hogy ki az aláíró-e, hogy megbízható-e az e-mailek! Bizonyos esetekben a DKIM aláírás hiánya hasznos lehet a becsapott e-mailek azonosításához. Ha ismert, hogy egy adott tartomány minden e-mailt aláír a DKIM-mel, a DKIM-aláírás hiánya erősen jelzi a hamis e-maileket. A megkönnyítés érdekében megvizsgálja, hogy az e-mail aláírt, a kiegészítő támogatja az aláírási szabályok használatát. A aláírási szabályokkal meghatározható, hogy egy bizonyos feladó e-mailéit mindig egy meghatározott tartomány (SDID-nek is nevezzük) aláírja. A jelszabályokról bővebben a https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Sign-rules. A rendelkezésre álló kiegészítő lehetőségek leírása megtalálható a https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Options oldalon.
description.zh-CN: 验证邮件的 DKIM 签名。 验证结果显示在邮件的头部分，并可根据喜好显示在状态栏、高亮发送者地址，或者在 From 头上悬停时显示工具提示。 此外，其他一些操作功能，像是“重新验证 DKIM 签名”等，可在邮件头的“其他操作”下拉菜单中找到。另外，可以指定签名规则来指示特定的电子邮件始终应该被签名。更多有关签名规则的信息请见 https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Sign-rules。 本附加组件可用的选项的描述也可在 https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Options 中找到。
description.ja: ドメインキー・アイデンティファイド・メールはドメインがメールに署名をすることを可能にします。このアドオンはメールヘッダーの DKIM 署名を検証し結果を表示します。そのためどのドメインが特定のメールに対して責任を持っているか確認をすることが可能になります。オプション設定で結果の表示方法の変更も可能です。 どのドメインでもメールに署名することが可能です。そのため有効な DKIM 署名だけでは信頼できるメールということにはなりません。メールが信頼出来るかどうかを判断するために、誰が署名したのかを常にチェックしてください！ 場合によっては、DKIM 署名が無いことが詐欺メールを特定するのに役立つことがあります。仮に、あるドメインが全てのメールに DKIM 署名を付けていることが知られている場合、DKIM 署名が無いことは偽メールであることを示す強力な情報です。 メールが署名されているかどうか、そして誰に署名されているかを簡単にチェックするために、このアドオンは署名ルールの利用をサポートします。署名ルールにより、ある送信者からの全てのメールは特定のドメイン（SDID とも言われる）により署名されると規定することも可能です。署名ルールの詳細は https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Sign-rules を参照してください。 アドオンの全てのオプションの説明は https://github.com/lieser/dkim_verifier/wiki/Options を参照してください。

description.en-US:
The default new-mail alert is subtle if the alert sound was turned off.
This extension adds blink feature to the new-mail alert.
You can also disable auto-hiding of the alert.

After the extension is installed, some options are added to the "Customize New Mail Alert" dialog.
Open "Options" dialog, select "General" page, and click "Customize" button right to the "Show an alert" check box.

If auto-hiding was disabled, you have to click close[X] button of the alert box to close it.
description.ja:
デフォルトの新着メール通知は、通知音がない場合に気がつかないことがあります。
この拡張機能は新着メール通知に点滅機能を追加します。
通知を自動的に閉じないようにもできます。

拡張機能をインストールすると、「デスクトップ通知」ダイアログにいくつかのオプションが追加されます。
「オプション」ダイアログを開き、「一般」ページを選択して、「デスクトップ通知を表示する」チェックボックスの右側にある「設定」ボタンをクリックします。

自動的に閉じないようにした場合、通知ボックスにあるクローズ[X]ボタンをクリックして閉じる必要があります。

Enjoy ! :)

description.en-US: ImportExportTools NG adds import and export functions for messages, folders and profiles. This derivative add-on is the update of the original work of Paolo "Kaosmos", ImportExportTools. The add-on is being updated for Thunderbird 68 (and 60) so that users can continue to enjoy the functionality of this great add-on. The first NG release, 4.0.0 , is a fork of v3.3.2 of the original add-on with the same functionality. The name and icon have been changed to differentiate from the original version. The author's original homepage as a reference: https://freeshell.de/~kaosmos/mboximport-en.html Original Add-on homepage: https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/importexporttools/?src=search Features: Menus: - Tools (most import and export functions including profiles) - Folders (most import and export functions) - Search dialog (export search results) - Selected messages (export or copy to clipboard) Export: - Individual folder(s), optionally including subfolders (mbox format) - All folder messages in the following formats: - EML, HTML, PDF, CSV or plaintext - Export as individual files or a single file - Optionally include attachments - Export indexes as plain text or CSV - Extensive file naming convention options - Export messages from search dialog Import: - Mbox files (including structure) - EML & EMLX files - Individual or all directory files Profiles: - Export complete profile or just the mail files - Import profile - Auto profile backup with schedule on shutdown SMS: - Import SMS from the "SMS Backup and Restore" program for Android and Nokia2AndroidSMS - Note: SMS not verified for NG (unable to test), please comment on issues Major Release Notes: v4.0.4: - ImportExportTools NG includes all functionality from v3.3.2 - Fixed issue #13 : Fix plaintext/HTML attachment exports - Fixed EML import issue - Improved HTML attachment boxes - Fixed text formater signature change

description.en-US: Sieve scripts filter incoming email. Message stores are commonly sealed servers so you cannot log into them, yet users must be able to update their scripts on them. This Extension implements the Manage Sieve protocol for securely managing Sieve scripts on a remote server. Sieve Scripts are run on the server side therefore you need an IMAP Account, which supports Sieve! Please report bugs via the issue tracker at github ( https://github.com/thsmi/sieve/issues ) or send an email to schmid-thomas at gmx.net You can find the most recent releases at https://github.com/thsmi/sieve/releases

caption.en-US: Easy editing with the drag and drop editor...
... just drag elements from the sidebar into the script.
Click on an element to edit the properties.

You can also use the plain text editor.
To switch between the editors just toggle the source button in the toolbar.
Manage your server side Sieve scripts
Settings integrated into the Account Settings

summary.en-US: This Extension implements the ManageSieve protocol for securely managing Sieve Script on a remote IMAP server...

description.fr:
Ce module permet de modifier le sujet d'un message reçu. 
depuis la version 2.0 deux choix dans les options:
1- Le changement s'effectue au niveau de la base de données locale de Thunderbird, et non dans le message lui-même (le Subject du Header reste l'original).
2- Le changement se fait dans le header du mail (compatibilite avec serveur imap)

Pour accéder à l'Option, depuis Thunderbird 60:
1- Activer la barre de menu avec un clic droit
2- Menu "Outils > Options des modules > EditEmailSubject"
3- Cocher/décocher la case
Pour l'utiliser:
1- Clic droit sur le mail, menu "Editer le sujet du message"
2- Touche "E"
description.en-US:
This module allows you to change email subjects.
Since 2.0 version in the options:
1- Changes are done into local TB messages database, not into the message (Subject from Header doesn't change).
2- Changes are directly into header, so it is imap compatible

To access Option, since Thunderbird 60:
1- Right click to enable Menu bar
2- Menu "Tools > Add-on Options > EditEmailSubject"
3- Check/uncheck checkbox

How to:
1- CRight click on mail, menu "Edit Mail Subject"
2- Hotkey "E"

description.en-US: Expression Search / G M a i l U I is an extension to Thunderbird (versions 5+) which add powerful message searching features. Originally written by Ken Mixter. Type "from:fred to:tom attachment:yes" to see all messages from Fred to Tom in the current view that have an attachment. Press Ctrl+Enter to have this search apply to all folders. More search operators can be view at here. Also support Ctrl/Shift + Right Click to search similar messages. Please report bug @ GitHub.

developer_comments.en-US: You do not need a GMail account to use this extension. It adds some GMail inspired features to your existing accounts. Please see help document in the options dialog to learn how to properly configure Expression Search to choose "Expression" searching for powerful searching options. If you are having trouble using this extension, please let me know (from home page or directly by writing to opera.wang+es@gmail.com) . For TB2, please use old versions from the history. When using 'tag search', the word you type can only match one tag, If you want match multiple tags, please use 'l:(tag1 or tag2) Due to restrictions in Thunderbird's virtual search folder, the complex searching results maybe correct in your current search results, but maybe NOT in you search folder. as the search folder can only handle 'Match all' and 'Match any' types. Version 0.9: Compatible with TB40 nightly and drop support for TB version less than 31 Attachment search is fully supported and won't crash TB any more, for offline messages only. Add option to put the Expression Search field into the Tab bar Add option to (not) remove the domain name for click2search Add option to hide the quick search filter icons Looks better on OSX and Ubuntu Version 0.8.8: Compatible with TB31 nightly and drop support for TB 5~11 regex search in body is fully supported and won't crash TB any more, for offline messages only. Version 0.8.7: Compatible with TB29 nightly Added regex search for from/to Added option to make the "search results" doesn't looks so big when search is not active Changed hotkey from Ctrl+Left to Ctrl+Alt+Left for back to original folder after Ctrl+Enter Version 0.8.6: getCellProperties API change for TB22 Add options for tooltip show/hide time change the flexibility of other element to make my search box bigger Add "Re: " to subject if it's a reply email for subject regex search Add 'Select All', 'Clear All' & select mode when modify virtual folder's folders. Fix bug: Donate through palpay directly not working because I'm in China Version 0.8.5: Added options for show or hide text labels of 'quick filter' buttons Added options to seperate subject replacment for Ctrl/Shift+RightClick Added options for load Saved Search folder in a new Tab Added hotkey Ctrl+Left for back to original folder after Ctrl+Enter Added regex search for headers Added regex search for body(experimental, may crash) Added newer_than/older_than support Added size/larger/smaller support Support NA for tag search, Star for status search Added today/yesterday/day/month/year for days search Added status bar icon & tips Added donate buttons Added scrollbar for option window when needed Fixed crash issue when ctrl2search on headers Fixed bugs for Ctrl+Enter launch gloda search when no messages found Fixed bugs for pined quick search buttons not work when switch between folders Fixed bugs for transparent background help page on Mac OS Fixed bugs for click2search triggers context menu on Mac OS Compatible with TB5~TB23 Version 0.8.4: Added tonocc/bcc/cc/only/age search Added options for show verbose information Added options for where to create expression search folders Fixed '<>' in search pattern issue when use click2search Fixed search issue when use click2search and address is in address book Fixed hang issue when '\t' exists in search pattern Fixed minor bug that extension defined search terms show when search in address book Fixed one bug that icons for quick search may missing when move search buttons to menubar or toolbar Version 0.8.3: Fixed context menu missing issue when click right button. Version 0.8.2: Work with Thunderbird 5. Fixed search bar shown issue. Fixed issue when search with complicated expressions. Version 0.8: Work with Thunderbird 3.3. Added Click2Search similar to The Bat! Added options to move expression search box to toolbar/menubar Added options to act as normal search box Added options to select 1st messages after hit enter in search box Hit enter will launch gloda search if no message found Hit Ctrl+B will focus on search box before/after search can now search time within day Added simple/regex/date search Added filename for attachment name/type search (experimental) Version 0.7: Added 'status/is' search. Added 'before/after' search. Added Help & Contact link to Options dialog. Added Options dialog. Work with Thunderbird 3.1 . Shift+Enter to launch gloda search. Fix 'Cc','Cu','Ci','Cr' redefine error. Added 'g:' search mode for gloda search. Press 'Esc' in thread tree will clear the search criteria. * Internationalization * zh-CN language support now exists. Please contact me if you would like to improve or provide new translations. ---------------------- Note: As the original author, Ken Mixter, didn't use Thunberbird anymore, I ported the addon to TB 3.1 and forked as 'Expression Search'. Later Ken Mixter kindly make me the new author, then I decided to merge the two addons together. Compare with original 0.6 version, these features are still missing: Use 'Y' to archive selected mail to archive folder (Use 'A' instead) Use J/K to move messages up and down, and Ctrl+J to mark a message as junk (conflict with builtin key mapping, use 'f/b' instead) Key '/' focuses on the quick search bar (use Ctrl+F)

description.fr:
Nouvelles importantes:
- Le problème de dossier vide est résolu.

Ajoutez autant de dossiers locaux que vous le souhaitez:
- Vous pouvez utiliser un lecteur / répertoire réseau
- Vous pouvez charger un dossier à partir d'un autre profil de TB (par exemple, une TB portable).
- Ajouter de nouveaux dossiers locaux à partir de la boîte de dialogue de création de compte

Nouveau dans v2.0.x:
- Options pour la corbeille vide, type de stockage des messages
- Ajouter des dossiers de courrier spéciaux au moment de la création
- Mise à jour avec les paramètres régionaux japonais et brésilien
description.de:
Wichtige Nachrichten:
- Das Problem mit leeren Ordnern wurde behoben.

Fügen Sie so viele lokale Ordner hinzu, wie Sie möchten:
- Sie können ein Netzlaufwerk / -verzeichnis verwenden
- Sie können einen Ordner aus einem anderen TB-Profil (z. B. tragbare TB) laden.
- Fügen Sie im Dialogfeld zur Kontoerstellung neue lokale Ordner hinzu

Neu in v2.0.x:
- Optionen für leeren Papierkorb, Nachrichtenspeichertyp
- Fügen Sie beim Erstellen spezielle Mail-Ordner hinzu
- Aktualisiert mit japanischen und brasilianischen portugiesischen Gebietsschemas
description.en-US:
Important News:
- The empty folder issue is fixed.

Add as many local folders as you want to :
- You can use a network drive/directory
- You can load a folder from another TB profile (eg. portable TB).
- Add new local folders from the account creation dialog

New In v2.0.x:
- Options for empty trash, message storage type
- Add special mail folders at creation time
- Updated with Japanese and Brazilian Portuguese locales
description.it:
Notizie importanti:
- Il problema relativo alla cartella vuota è stato risolto.

Aggiungi tutte le cartelle locali che vuoi:
- È possibile utilizzare un'unità / directory di rete
- È possibile caricare una cartella da un altro profilo TB (ad es. TB portatile).
- Aggiungi nuove cartelle locali dalla finestra di dialogo di creazione dell'account

Novità in v2.0.x:
- Opzioni per cestino vuoto, tipo di archiviazione dei messaggi
- Aggiungi cartelle di posta speciali al momento della creazione
- Aggiornato con locali portoghesi giapponesi e brasiliani
description.hu:
Fontos hírek:
- Az üres mappa ki van javítva.

Adjon hozzá annyi helyi mappát, amennyit csak akar:
- Használhat hálózati meghajtót / könyvtárat
- Töltsön be egy mappát egy másik TB-profilból (pl. Hordozható TB).
- Új helyi mappák hozzáadása a fiók létrehozási párbeszédpanelen

Új verzió a v2.0.x-ben:
- Beállítások az üres kukához, az üzenet tárolási típusa
- Speciális levélmappák hozzáadása a létrehozáskor
- Japán és brazil portugál nyelvekkel frissítve
description.pt-BR:
Notícias importantes:
- O problema da pasta vazia é fixo.

Adicione quantas pastas locais você quiser:
- Você pode usar uma unidade de rede / diretório
- Você pode carregar uma pasta de outro perfil TB (por exemplo, TB portátil).
- Adicionar novas pastas locais a partir do diálogo de criação de conta

Novo na v2.0.x:
- Opções para lixo vazio, tipo de armazenamento de mensagens
- Adicionar pastas de email especiais no momento da criação
- Atualizado com locais em japonês e português brasileiro
description.sv-SE:
Lägg till hur många lokala mappar du vill (precis som Outlooks PST-fil):

Det finns ingen hjälpfil, men titta gärna på skärmbilderna.

OBS: Tillägget importerar inte PST-filer.

description.en-US:
You can define rules like
  • Archive messages that from someone with subject test and 60 days old within Inbox and it's sub directory
  • Move messages that from foo with subject bar and 60 days old within src folder and it's sub directory to local folders, keeps the folder hierarchy.
  • Copy messages from one virtual folder to another folder
  • Delete all messages from Junk folder after 7 days
If you have Expression Search / GMailUI or FiltaQuilla installed, you can even have regular expression search for subject(both addon) or sender(only Expression Search/GmailUI). This addon support "From", "Recipient", "Subject" filters for rule, if you would like more complicated filter or folder selection, please try 'Saved Search Folder' and select the folder as "Source Folder". The build-in filters lack of method to run periodically (bug 864147), and can only set based on accounts instead of folders (bug 294632). This addon implement the auto archive(bug 536169), and auto backup / delete (bug 93094) feature. It's was inspired by autoarchive but autoarchive can't deal with sub folders. AutoarchiveReloaded is much better than autoarchive but still can't define rules. So I wrote this one. Please report bugs @ https://github.com/wangvisual/autoarchive/issues Version History: 0.8: Works with TB 60 release and TB 63 nightly 0.7: Works with TB 56 nightly 0.6: Fixed a critical bug that cause duplicate emails for POP3 in version 0.5 Backup rules in profile folder to avoid lost rules Can give detail skip reason for why messages was not moved/copied etc. Minor issues fixed Drop support for TB < 24. 0.5: Added size & tag filter, hide by default. User can config how to fill the filed when generate rule from email context menu Check if server can be connected before running Show progress and summary in activity manager Added option to delete duplicate messages in source folder when moving Can select folder like account name or [Gmail] Fixed an issue that 'unread mail' rule in advanced settings is not work Fixed issue when folder name contains blanks Support rules that contain non-ASCII characters Compatible with TB13 & TB31 nightly change 0.4: Show summary of finished rule in status bar & tooltip of Archie(the purple alien) Can temperately disable schedule for 1 hour / 4 hours etc Added 'Apply' button Skip busy(locked) folders Context menu for creating rule based on message selected Set the min height of the perf dialog The popup time of the alert window now can be config Compatible with TB 17~30 and SeaMonkey 2.20~2.27 0.3: Fixed issues with Linux/MacOS Add 'Recipient' to filter User can config how the folder show as Minor bugs fixed and added other bugs too. 0.2: Do not archive messages that already in archive folder. Added dry run mode, dry run button, and dry run summary. Added batch run limitations. Fixed a bug that always include sub folders (JavaScript treat strings "0" as true) Update folders before call search Update folders for Archive action Use createSubfolder instead of createStorageIfMissing to prevent losing control issue Add Watch dog Update status bar text Only wait for needed idle time. When in offline mode, don't change mails on server. Make the preference dialog not so inscrutable by adding a header. 0.1: Initial public release Support Archive/Move/Delete/Copy actions Support sub folders When Move/Copy, user can choose to keep folder structures (select scope hierarchy) Tagged/Starred/Unread mails can have exception days before actions. You can config when the addon activate, first start time / next start time etc, and can make it activate only after some time of computer idle. Status bar icon(Archie) for status of the the addon.

description.en-US: Thunderbird Beta compatible versions: The new compatible versions are "hidden" on this website and can only be found behind the link "View other versions". So have a look there, please. General information: This add-on adds a simple "Send later" button to the compose window toolbar. There are no new/own functions. The button is just a simple way to always have the send later option visible and reachable by just one click. You can use the "Send later" button with standard Thunderbird to save your new mail in the "Outbox". In case you're using the additional add-on "Send Later" (by jikamens), the button is completely compatible with this add-on and invokes its dialog.
description.de: Thunderbird Beta-kompatible Versionen: Die neuen kompatiblen Versionen werden auf dieser Webseite bisher "versteckt" und sind nur unter dem Link "Andere Versionen ansehen" zu finden. Schauen Sie bitte dort nach. Allgemeine Information: Dieses Add-on bietet eine eigenständige Schaltfläche "Später senden" im Verfassen-Fenster. Das Add-on hat keine neuen bzw. eigenen Funktionen. Die Schaltfläche ist nur eine jederzeit einfach erreichbare Möglichkeit zum späteren Senden. Sie können die Schaltfläche "Später senden" mit dem standardmäßigen Thunderbird verwenden. Dann werden Ihre Nachrichten im "Postausgang" gespeichert, um diese später zu versenden. Wenn Sie zusätzlich das Add-on "Später senden" (von jikamens) verwenden, wird mit der Schaltfläche dessen Dialogfeld mit den Optionen zum späteren Senden aufgerufen.

description.en-US: This add-on adds arrow buttons at the top of the folder pane which rotate back and forth through the various available folder views This add-on also causes Thunderbird to automatically switch to the "All Folders" view when you hover over the title above the folder tree for several seconds during a message drag & drop operation, and switch back automatically after the drop. In the add-on preferences, you can set the delay before the view is switched. Finally, in the add-on preferences, you can select which views are accessible in the pop-up menu at the top of the folder list, and of those, which show up when you rotate through the views using the arrow buttons. Compatibility notes: If you want to use this add-on with versions of Thunderbird prior to 49, you will need to download version 1.14. This older version does not have the ability to control which views are enabled. This add-on is incompatible with the "Maximize Message Pane" add-on.
